original: brind'a ra ka gzugs ldan gtso //

analyzed: kham ni bar snang mo dbang la'ang //

analyzed: ri la brikshoo na g'a ba goo //

analyzed: a'a shu goo b'a yu bi shi khoo sha r'arka bi ha g'a: kha g'a: //

original: khrus tshal dang ni rdul la yang //

analyzed: ga mtha' rnams so //

analyzed: bi par++y'a se bista re pi pra panytsa p'a ba ke shu tsi: //

original: aa bhi shvam ga spri * //
analyzed: aa bhi shvam ga spri * //

original: gham sdig sdug nyon mongs la //
analyzed: gham sdig sdug nyon mongs la //
translated: Gha is the suffering of sin.

original: 'dod dang nyung la la ghu'o //
analyzed: 'dod dang nyung la la ghu'o //
translated: Desire, little, and laghu.

original: gha mtha' rnams so //
analyzed: gha mtha' rnams so //

analyzed: k'a tsa dra ba'i thag pa dang // mching bu dang ni ling thog go //

original: phyir log rgya chen pra panytsa //
analyzed: phyir log rgya chen pra panytsa //

original: shu ci me dang zla ba dang // shin tu gnon pa dag dang ni //
analyzed: shu ci me dang zla ba dang // shin tu gnon pa dag dang ni //

original: skyes bu rnam dag dkar po gsum //
analyzed: skyes bu rnam dag dkar po gsum //

analyzed: mngon 'khyud dang ni h'a y'anytsa ga bhastoo tsa ru tsi: stri y'am //

analyzed: ke ki t'arkshy'a ba hi bhu dzoo danta bi pr'anda dz'a dvi dz'a: //

analyzed: dharmma ra dzoo dzi na ya moo kunydzo dante pi nastri y'am //

analyzed: ba la dze kshe tra p'urdv'a re ba la dz'a balgu darsha n'a //

original: 'dod pa dang // 'od la ru tsi bud med do //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang // 'od la ru tsi bud med do //

original: tsa mtha' rnams so //
analyzed: tsa mtha' rnams so //

analyzed: chos rgyal rgyal ba gshin rje'o //

analyzed: kunydza so dang phug pa'o //

original: ba la dza ni zhing grong sgo //
analyzed: ba la dza ni zhing grong sgo //

analyzed: ba la dz'a ni legs par mthong//

analyzed: pra ma nam ni gtan tshigs dang // yul lugs bstan bcos sdom brtson tshad //

analyzed: ka ra nam ni sgrub nus dang // zhing dang lus dbang rnams la yang //

original: sam pa ra na srog chags skye //
analyzed: sam pa ra na srog chags skye //

analyzed: dpung tshogs rgyu dang @222a * //

analyzed: aa tastri shu bi sh'a nam sy'atpa shu shringge bhadanta yo: //

analyzed: pra ba nam kra ma nimnorby'am pra hve n'a tu tsa tushpa the //

analyzed: sam k'irnno ni tsi t'a shuddha bi ri nam sh'u n+ya m'u sha ram //

original: khral 'bab lam gyi mtha' la'o //
analyzed: khral 'bab lam gyi mtha' la'o //

analyzed: 'di ni gsum ste bi sh'a na //

original: phyugs kyi rva dang btsun pa la'o //

analyzed: pra ba na ni rim gyis gzhol //

analyzed: dga' dang bzhi mdo rnams la'o //

analyzed: yant'a hast'i pa ke s'u te bhartt'a dh'a ta ri poshta ri //

analyzed: y'a na mtha'o //

analyzed: bi ba shvantoo nyi ma lha //

analyzed: sva ra svantoo gtsang bo mtsho //

analyzed: ga runmantoo 'dab chags khyung //

analyzed: hastoo lag pa rgyu skar ....(me bzhi/) la'o //

analyzed: rlung dang 'chi med ma ru too //
translated: the wind, the immortal, the wind,🔽the lord, the world, the sun,

original: yant'a glang chen kha lo sgyur //
analyzed: yant'a glang chen kha lo sgyur //

translated: Bharta is the supporter and nourisher.🔽Grāma is a village, pātra a vessel, śiśu a child, pota a boat, preta a ghost, prāṇa life, and tare means “save me!”

original: s'u ta bzo @222b s'a ra thoo //
analyzed: s'u ta bzo @222b s'a ra thoo //
translated: Mūrdhabhiṣikta is a kṣatriya, and ṛtu means “woman” and “flower.”🔽Viṣṇu is called Jita and Tyakta, and sūta means “artisan” and “chariot.”

analyzed: byakta: pr'adznye pi drisht'ant'a bu bhe sh'astra ni darsha ne //

analyzed: kshatt'a sy'at+s'a ra thoo dv'a: sthe ksha tri y'a y'anytsa sh'u dra dze //

analyzed: britt'anta sy'atpra ka ra ne pra k'a re kart+sn+ya b'artta yo: //

analyzed: a'a nartta sa ma re nri tya sth'a na n'i bridpi she shayo: // kri t'anto bo'i kha lo sgyur //

analyzed: byakta mkhas dang gsal ba'o //
translated: kṛtānta,  bhoḥ,  khala,  vāhana,  sūta,  vyakta,  viśeṣa,

analyzed: dpe dang bstan bcos drisht'anta //
translated: dṛṣṭānta,  ābhīṣu,  śāstra,  nidarśana,

analyzed: kshatt'a kha lo sgyur ba dang // sgo skyong rgyal rigs dmangs 'dres bu //
translated: kṣattā,  sārathi,  dvāḥ,  sthita,  kṣatriya,  āyudha,  śūdra,  jaṭa,

original: britt'anta ni rab byed dang // bye brag tshogs pa gtam rnams la'o //🔽a'a nartta ni g-yul dang ni //
analyzed: britt'anta ni rab byed dang // bye brag tshogs pa gtam rnams la'o // a'a nartta ni g-yul dang ni //
translated: vṛttānta,  āpta,  prakāra,  kara,  tsan,  nyāya,  vartita,

original: gar gnas skyes mtha'i bye brag la //
analyzed: gar gnas skyes mtha'i bye brag la //
translated: ānarthasaṃvara,  nṛtyasthāna,  nīti,  bṛddhi,  śeṣa,

analyzed: kri ya ma siddh'anta dee b'a ku sha la karmma su //
translated: kṛtānta,  bhoḥ,  khala,  vāhana,  sūta,  vyakta,  viśeṣa, 🔽kṛyā,  siddhi,  ānta,  deśa,  vāc,  kuśala,  karma,

original: shleshm'a di ra sa rakt'a di ma h'a bh'u t'a ni tam gu na: //
analyzed: shleshm'a di ra sa rakt'a di ma h'a bh'u t'a ni tam gu na: //
translated: śleṣa,  ādi,  rasa,  rakta,  ādhi,  mahā,  bhūta,  ānta,  guṇa,

original: aindri y'a nyasma bi kri ti shapta yo n+yasthi dh'a ta ba: //
analyzed: aindri y'a nyasma bi kri ti shapta yo n+yasthi dh'a ta ba: //
translated: Indra, Yasas, Vikrita, Tishtha, Dhatu,

original: ka ksh'anta re pi suddh'ant'a nri pa sy'a sarba go tsa re //
analyzed: ka ksh'anta re pi suddh'ant'a nri pa sy'a sarba go tsa re //
translated: Kakshanta, Sudhantara, Nripasya, Sarvagocara,🔽Kasuma, Arthya, Anta, and Yama,

original: k'a su p'a marthya t'anta ni gshin rje dang // grub mtha' dbang thang mi dge'i las //
analyzed: k'a su p'a marthya t'anta ni gshin rje dang // grub mtha' dbang thang mi dge'i las //
translated: are the limits of the philosophical systems, power, and non-virtuous karma.

original: bad kan la sogs ro dang ni //
analyzed: bad kan la sogs ro dang ni //
translated: Phlegm and so forth are the tastes,🔽and blood and so forth are the great elements,

original: khrag sogs 'byung ba chen po dang // de yi yon tan dbang po rnams //
analyzed: khrag sogs 'byung ba chen po dang // de yi yon tan dbang po rnams //
translated: and their qualities are the sense faculties.

original: rdo yi rnam 'gyur sgra'i skye gnas //
analyzed: rdo yi rnam 'gyur sgra'i skye gnas //
translated: The forms of stone are the source of sound,

original: dh'a tu yin te khams zhes so //
analyzed: dh'a tu yin te khams zhes so //
translated: and the dhatus are the constituents.

original: kaksh'anta re btsun mo'i 'khor //
analyzed: kaksh'anta re btsun mo'i 'khor //
translated: Kakshanta is the retinue of the queen,

original: mi dbang kun gyi spyod yo: shaktirm'urtti: k'a thi n+ya k'a ya yo: //🔽bist'a ra ballyo: pra ta tirba sa ti r'a tri beshma no: //🔽ksha y'artsa yo ra pa tsi ti: s'a tird'a n'a ba s'a na yo: //
analyzed: mi dbang kun gyi spyod yo: shaktirm'urtti: k'a thi n+ya k'a ya yo: // bist'a ra ballyo: pra ta tirba sa ti r'a tri beshma no: // ksha y'artsa yo ra pa tsi ti: s'a tird'a n'a ba s'a na yo: //
translated: the power of all kings, and the body of the reciter.🔽The clear sky is the path, and the night is the darkness.

original: aartti p'i d'a dha nu: ko tyordz'a ti: s'a m'a n+ya dzanma no: //
analyzed: aartti p'i d'a dha nu: ko tyordz'a ti: s'a m'a n+ya dzanma no: //
translated: The waning of the moon is the desire for food,🔽and the full moon is the birth of wealth.

original: pra ts'a ra syanda yo r'i ti r'i ti dimba pra b'a sa yul min //
analyzed: pra ts'a ra syanda yo r'i ti r'i ti dimba pra b'a sa yul min //
translated: Pracāra is motion, and praśānta is calm.

original: mtshon dang nus pa shakti'o //
analyzed: mtshon dang nus pa shakti'o //
translated: Śakti is weapon and power.

original: m'urti sra dang lus la'o //
analyzed: m'urti sra dang lus la'o //
translated: Mūrti is solidity and body.

original: yangs pa 'khri shing pra ta ti //
analyzed: yangs pa 'khri shing pra ta ti //
translated: Prati is extensive, and latā is creeper.

original: ba sa ti ni mtshan mo khyim //
analyzed: ba sa ti ni mtshan mo khyim //
translated: Vasati is night, and gṛha is house.

original: zad mchod aa pa tsi ti'o //
analyzed: zad mchod aa pa tsi ti'o //
translated: Apaściti is worship, and kṣaya is offering.

original: s'a ti spyin dang gnas dag lo //
analyzed: s'a ti spyin dang gnas dag lo //
translated: Sati is giving, and sthāna is place.🔽Arati is pain, and dhanuḥ is the best of bows.

original: aa rti zug rdu gzhu yi mchog / dz'a ti spyi dang skye ba dag / rab skyod bskyod pa a'i ti'o //
analyzed: aa rti zug rdu gzhu yi mchog / dz'a ti spyi dang skye ba dag / rab skyod bskyod pa a'i ti'o //
translated: Jāti is general, and janma is birth.

original: r'i ti mchod dang gnas dag @223a * //
analyzed: r'i ti mchod dang gnas dag @223a * //
translated: Āiti is moving, and rati is worship and place.🔽Udya, adhigama, prāpti, trātā, tva, kṛta, yuge,

original: yo: // au da yo& dhi ga me pr'apti stre t'a tvakni tra ye yu ge / pi n'a bhe de pima ha t'i bh'u tarbhasma ni sampa ti //
analyzed: yo: // au da yo& dhi ga me pr'apti stre t'a tvakni tra ye yu ge / pi n'a bhe de pima ha t'i bh'u tarbhasma ni sampa ti //
translated: pinā, bheda, pinah, tā, bhūta, rbhāsmān, samāpti,

original: na d'i nagar++yorn'a ga n'am bho ga ba tya tha sam ga re //
analyzed: na d'i nagar++yorn'a ga n'am bho ga ba tya tha sam ga re //
translated: nādinagaryorniṣā, nāgānāṃ bhoga, vatyatha, saṃgare.

original: sam ge sa bh'a y'am sa mi ti: ksha ya b'a s'a ba pi kshi ti: //
analyzed: sam ge sa bh'a y'am sa mi ti: ksha ya b'a s'a ba pi kshi ti: //
translated: Saṅge, sabhāyāṃ, samitiḥ, kṣayavāsā, vapikṣitiḥ,

original: ra be ra rtsishtsa * //
analyzed: ra be ra rtsishtsa * //
translated: raver, rucis, tva,

original: go ; / shar dang thob pa pr'apti'o //
analyzed: go ; / shar dang thob pa pr'apti'o //
translated: prāpti is east and attainment.

original: stre t'a me gsum gsum ldan dus //
analyzed: stre t'a me gsum gsum ldan dus //
translated: The three, strī, tā, and me, are used in the sense of three times.

original: pi wang dbye ba ma ha t'i //
analyzed: pi wang dbye ba ma ha t'i //
translated: The word pīvāṅga is used in the sense of a kind of lute.

original: bh'u ti thal ba phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: bh'u ti thal ba phun sum tshogs //
translated: The word bhūti is used in the sense of ashes and perfection.

original: gtsang po klu yi grong khyer rnams //
analyzed: gtsang po klu yi grong khyer rnams //
translated: The word bhūti is used in the sense of river and city of the nāgas.

original: bho ga ba ti de nas g-yul //
analyzed: bho ga ba ti de nas g-yul //
translated: The word bhogavatī is used in the sense of battle and prosperity.

original: grogs dang 'phong sa sa mi ti //
analyzed: grogs dang 'phong sa sa mi ti //
translated: The word samiti is used in the sense of friend and battlefield.

original: zad dang gnas la kshi ti'o //
analyzed: zad dang gnas la kshi ti'o //
translated: The word kṣiti is used in the sense of end and abode.

original: nyi ma'i 'od zer shastranytsa bahni dzv'a l'a tsa he ta ya: //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od zer shastranytsa bahni dzv'a l'a tsa he ta ya: //
translated: The word śastrāñjana-jvālā-caḥ is used in the sense of sun's rays.

original: dza ga t'i dza ga ti tstshandi bi she she pi kshi t'a ba pi //
analyzed: dza ga t'i dza ga ti tstshandi bi she she pi kshi t'a ba pi //
translated: The word jagatī-jagatī-cchandī-viśeṣa-kṣitā-vapī is used in the sense of a kind of meter.

original: pamktishtsando pi da sha mam sy'atpra bh'a be pi ts'a ya ti: //
analyzed: pamktishtsando pi da sha mam sy'atpra bh'a be pi ts'a ya ti: //
translated: The word paṅkti-cchando-daśa-mātra-prabhāva-pi cāyate is used in the sense of a kind of meter.

original: pattirgga too tsa m'u le pi baksha ti: paksha bhe da yo: //
analyzed: pattirgga too tsa m'u le pi baksha ti: paksha bhe da yo: //
translated: The word patti-gagata-ca-mūle-bakṣati-pakṣa-bheda-yoḥ is used in the sense of a kind of meter.

original: pra kri tir++yo ni lim ge tsa koo shi ky'a dy'ashtsa britta ya: //
analyzed: pra kri tir++yo ni lim ge tsa koo shi ky'a dy'ashtsa britta ya: //
translated: The word prakṛti-yonilinge-kauśikī-adyāścā-vṛtti-yaḥ is used in the sense of a kind of meter.

original: si ka t'a: syurb'a lu mtshon cha dang // me lce 'bar la he ti'o //🔽dza ga t'i ni 'gro ba dang // sdeb sbyor bye brag sa gzhi la'ang //🔽pamkti gral dang yig bcu'i sdeb //
analyzed: si ka t'a: syurb'a lu mtshon cha dang // me lce 'bar la he ti'o //🔽dza ga t'i ni 'gro ba dang // sdeb sbyor bye brag sa gzhi la'ang //🔽pamkti gral dang yig bcu'i sdeb //
translated: The word sikatā-syur-vāluka is used in the sense of sand and gravel.

original: 'od dang chags pa a'a ya ti //
analyzed: 'od dang chags pa a'a ya ti //
translated: Light, attachment, and Āyāti,

original: batti 'gro dang rkang thang ngo //
analyzed: batti 'gro dang rkang thang ngo //
translated: Batti, going, and pedestrian.

original: rtsa ba gshog dbye paksha ti //
analyzed: rtsa ba gshog dbye paksha ti //
translated: Root, wing-spreading, Pakṣati,

original: pra kri ti ni skye gnas rtags //
analyzed: pra kri ti ni skye gnas rtags //
translated: Prakṛti, birth, and sign.

original: gar gyis 'tsho ba britti'o //
analyzed: gar gyis 'tsho ba britti'o //
translated: Dancing for a living, Bṛtti.

original: si ka t'a ni bye gyo dum //
analyzed: si ka t'a ni bye gyo dum //
translated: Sikatā, sand, and gravel.

original: k'a pi be de shra ba si tsa shru ti: //
analyzed: k'a pi be de shra ba si tsa shru ti: //
translated: Kāpibeda, Śrava, and Śruta.

original: ba ni t'a dza ni t'a tya rth'a nu r'a g'a y'am tsa yo shi ti //
analyzed: ba ni t'a dza ni t'a tya rth'a nu r'a g'a y'am tsa yo shi ti //
translated: Vānitā, Jānitā, and Arthatyā, and Anurāgā, and Cayoṣit.

original: gupti: kshi ti byu d'a se pi dhri tirdh'a ra na dher++ya yo: //
analyzed: gupti: kshi ti byu d'a se pi dhri tirdh'a ra na dher++ya yo: //
translated: Gupti, Kṣiti, Vyudāsa, and Dhṛti, Adhara, and Dheya.

original: pri ha t'i kshu dra b'artta k'i tstshando bhe de ma ha tya pi //
analyzed: pri ha t'i kshu dra b'artta k'i tstshando bhe de ma ha tya pi //
translated: Prihatī, Kṣudra, Varttaka, and Cchando, Bheda, and Mahātī.

original: b'a si t'astr'i ka ra nyoshtsa b'artt'a brittoo dza na shru too //
analyzed: b'a si t'astr'i ka ra nyoshtsa b'artt'a brittoo dza na shru too //
translated: Vāsitā, Svastrī, Karanya, and Uṣṇac, Varttā, Bṛtti, and Jāna.🔽Śruta, Varttam, Phalgunya, Roga, and Gṛdhra, Suca, and Gṛdā.

original: b'arttam phalgu n+ya ro ge tu tri shvapsu tsa ghri t'a rig byed thos pa shru ti'o //
analyzed: b'arttam phalgu n+ya ro ge tu tri shvapsu tsa ghri t'a rig byed thos pa shru ti'o //
translated: Śrava, hearing the Vedas.

original: ba ni t'a dang dza ni ta //
analyzed: ba ni t'a dang dza ni ta //
translated: Vānitā, and Jānitā,

original: ma dang rjes chags bud med la //
analyzed: ma dang rjes chags bud med la //
translated: Mother, and subsequent attachment, woman.

original: gupti dong 'bru bug bcas gru //
analyzed: gupti dong 'bru bug bcas gru //
translated: Gupti, digging, and pit, together.

original: dhri ti 'dzin dang blo gros so //
analyzed: dhri ti 'dzin dang blo gros so //
translated: Dhṛti, holding, and intelligence.

original: bri ha t'i ni bum sman dang // sdeb sbyor dbye ba chen po la'ang //
analyzed: bri ha t'i ni bum sman dang // sdeb sbyor dbye ba chen po la'ang //
translated: are called Bṛhat and Lakṣaṇa.

original: bud med glang mo b'a si t'a //🔽b'artt'a 'tsho ba skye bo'i gtam //
analyzed: bud med glang mo b'a si t'a // b'artt'a 'tsho ba skye bo'i gtam //
translated: The science of women, of elephants, and of horses,🔽are called Vātsyāyana, Vārttā, and Vārttānta.

original: b'arttam nad med snying po med //
analyzed: b'arttam nad med snying po med //
translated: The science of medicine is called Āyurveda.

original: zhun mar mar @223b mri te //
analyzed: zhun mar mar @223b mri te //
translated: Clarified butter is called ghṛta.

original: ka la dhoo tam r'u pya he mnorni mittam he tu laksha no: //
analyzed: ka la dhoo tam r'u pya he mnorni mittam he tu laksha no: //
translated: Silver and gold are called kādamba and rūpya.🔽The cause is called hetu and nimitta.

original: shru tam sh'astr'a ba dhri ta yor++yu ga par++y'apta yo: kri tam //
analyzed: shru tam sh'astr'a ba dhri ta yor++yu ga par++y'apta yo: kri tam //
translated: The heard is called śruta and āsthita.

original: aa ty'a hi tam ma h'a bh'i ti: karma dz'i b'a na pe kshi tsa //🔽yuktekshm'a d'a bri te bh'u tam pr'a nya t'i te sa me tri shu //
analyzed: aa ty'a hi tam ma h'a bh'i ti: karma dz'i b'a na pe kshi tsa // yuktekshm'a d'a bri te bh'u tam pr'a nya t'i te sa me tri shu //
translated: The complete is called mahābhūti and karma.🔽The united and the compassionate are called bhrūta and prāpta.🔽The good is called pārya and cāritra.

original: brittam pa dye tsa ri tre tri ni aa mri ta //
analyzed: brittam pa dye tsa ri tre tri ni aa mri ta //
translated: The immortal is called amṛta.

original: ka la dhoo tam dngul dang gser //
analyzed: ka la dhoo tam dngul dang gser //
translated: Silver and gold are called kādamba and rūpya.

original: ni mitta nam mtshan nyid rgyu //
analyzed: ni mitta nam mtshan nyid rgyu //
translated: The cause is called hetu and nimitta.

original: shru tam bstan bcos thos pa 'dzin //
analyzed: shru tam bstan bcos thos pa 'dzin //
translated: The heard is called śruta and āsthita.

original: kri tam rdzogs ldan yongs su thob //
analyzed: kri tam rdzogs ldan yongs su thob //
translated: The complete is called mahābhūti and karma.

original: aa ty'a hi tam 'jigs chen dang // 'tsho ba la ni ltos pa'i las //
analyzed: aa ty'a hi tam 'jigs chen dang // 'tsho ba la ni ltos pa'i las //
translated: The life-dependent action is called ātyāhita and mahābhi.

original: rigs pas sogs dus bh'u tam //
analyzed: rigs pas sogs dus bh'u tam //
translated: By reason, etc.

original: srog chags 'das dus 'dra ba gsum //
analyzed: srog chags 'das dus 'dra ba gsum //
translated: The three are similar to the past time.

original: brittam tshigs bcad spyod pa shva t'i ta dri dha ni sta le //
analyzed: brittam tshigs bcad spyod pa shva t'i ta dri dha ni sta le //
translated: The three are: bhittaṃ, verse, conduct, śvetā, white, and rūpya, silver.

original: ma ha dr'a dzyam ts'a ba g'i tam dza n+ye sy'anggarhi te tri shu //
analyzed: ma ha dr'a dzyam ts'a ba g'i tam dza n+ye sy'anggarhi te tri shu //
translated: Mahādṛṣṭi, great view, and avagītaṃ, sung, are the three.🔽Śvetā, white, and rūpya, silver, are the three.

original: shve tam ru pye pi ra dza tam h'a re r'u pya si te tri shu //
analyzed: shve tam ru pye pi ra dza tam h'a re r'u pya si te tri shu //
translated: Rājā, king, and rūpya, silver, are the three.

original: tri shva to dza ga dingge pi raktann'i ly'a di r'a gi tsa //🔽aa ba d'a ta: si te p'i te shuddhe gsum //
analyzed: tri shva to dza ga dingge pi raktann'i ly'a di r'a gi tsa // aa ba d'a ta: si te p'i te shuddhe gsum //
translated: The three are: jagad, world, and dṛśya, visible, and rakta, red, and nīla, blue, and rāga, attachment.

original: 'das dus brtan pa zlum po la //
analyzed: 'das dus brtan pa zlum po la //
translated: Avadāta, white, and pīta, yellow, and śuddha, pure, are the three.

original: aa ba g'i tam rgyal srid dang // skye bos smod dang chen po la //🔽shve tam dngul dang dkar po la //
analyzed: aa ba g'i tam rgyal srid dang // skye bos smod dang chen po la // shve tam dngul dang dkar po la //
translated: The three are: dṛḍha, firm, and varta, round, and avagītaṃ, sung, and rājya, kingdom, and janaiḥ, by people, and garhita, despised.🔽Śvetā, white, and rūpya, silver, and rāja, king, are the three.

original: ra dza tam ni do shal dang // dngul dang dkar po rnams la gsum //🔽dza gad 'gro dang 'khor ba la //
analyzed: ra dza tam ni do shal dang // dngul dang dkar po rnams la gsum // dza gad 'gro dang 'khor ba la //
translated: Rūpya, silver, and rāja, king, and hāra, necklace, are the three.

original: rakta sngo sogs chags pa la //
analyzed: rakta sngo sogs chags pa la //
translated: Jagad, world, and dṛśya, visible, and rakta, red, and nīla, blue, and rāga, attachment, are the three.

original: aa ba d'a ta dkar po dang // ser po dang badh'ardzu noo si too //
analyzed: aa ba d'a ta dkar po dang // ser po dang badh'ardzu noo si too //
translated: Avadāta, white, and pīta, yellow, and bhadram, good, and arjuna, white, are the three.

original: yukte& bhi sam skri te& marshi nya bh'i n'i tonyatha sam skri tam //
analyzed: yukte& bhi sam skri te& marshi nya bh'i n'i tonyatha sam skri tam //
translated: Yukta, bhisamskṛta, marśī, nyavahantī, toṣaṇam.

original: kri tri me laksha no pi te pya nanto na ba dh'a ba pi //
analyzed: kri tri me laksha no pi te pya nanto na ba dh'a ba pi //
translated: Kṛtrima, lakṣaṇopaiti, pyananto, vadhāvapti.

original: khy'a te hrishte pra t'i to& bhi dz'a tastu ku la dze bu dhe //
analyzed: khy'a te hrishte pra t'i to& bhi dz'a tastu ku la dze bu dhe //
translated: Khayate, hṛṣṭa, prātita, abhijāt, kulaje, buddhi.

original: bi biktoo p'u ta bi dza noo ni dag pa'o //
analyzed: bi biktoo p'u ta bi dza noo ni dag pa'o //
translated: Vibhakta, ūrdhva, vijano, niravadya.

original: lhag lus dkar po si ta'o //
analyzed: lhag lus dkar po si ta'o //
translated: Śukla, śeṣa.

original: rigs dang mngon par legs sbyar dang // nus pa aa bhi ni to'o //🔽de nas legs sbyar zin pa dang // mtshan nyid au pa te yang ngo //🔽aa nanta ni mtha' yas dga' //
analyzed: rigs dang mngon par legs sbyar dang // nus pa aa bhi ni to'o // de nas legs sbyar zin pa dang // mtshan nyid au pa te yang ngo // aa nanta ni mtha' yas dga' //
translated: Vṛṣa, abhinirmita, abhinirukti, abhinirvṛtti.🔽Ananta, ananta, rati.

original: grags dang yid 'ong pra t'i ta //🔽aa bhi dz'a ta rigs skyes blo //
analyzed: grags dang yid 'ong pra t'i ta // aa bhi dz'a ta rigs skyes blo //
translated: Yaśa, manohara, prātita.🔽Abhijāt, buddhi.

original: bi biktoo ni dag dang dben //🔽m'urtstshi @224a * //
analyzed: bi biktoo ni dag dang dben // m'urtstshi @224a * //
translated: Vibhakta, ūrdhva, vijana, niravadya.

original: m'urtstshi too m'u dha sotstshva yoo //
analyzed: m'urtstshi too m'u dha sotstshva yoo //
translated: Murcchita, murcchito, mudhas, ucchvaya.

original: dvoo ts'ambu pa ru shoo shuktoo sh'i ti dha ba la me tsa koo / sa tye s'a dhoo bidya m'a ne bra shastenyabhyarhi te tsa sata //
analyzed: dvoo ts'ambu pa ru shoo shuktoo sh'i ti dha ba la me tsa koo / sa tye s'a dhoo bidya m'a ne bra shastenyabhyarhi te tsa sata //
translated: Satyaṃ, sādho, vidyā, māne, praste, nyabhyahita, ca sat /

original: pu ra skri ta: p'u dzi tenyar'a tya bhi yuktenyagra ta: kri te //
analyzed: pu ra skri ta: p'u dzi tenyar'a tya bhi yuktenyagra ta: kri te //
translated: Pūrāskṛtaḥ, pūjita, nyārātya, abhiyukta, grataḥ, kṛtaḥ /🔽Nivāta, vāśra, yāvata, śraṣṭā, rabhedyaṃ, ca /

original: ni b'a t'a b'a shra ya b'a tooshrastr'a bhe dyam tsa * //
analyzed: ni b'a t'a b'a shra ya b'a tooshrastr'a bhe dyam tsa * //
translated: Niva, tava, vasha, tava, oshra, shashta, bhedya, cha.

original: too ni rmongs dang mtho //
analyzed: too ni rmongs dang mtho //
translated: ni, delusion, and🔽dva, two, and🔽śukta, sour, and

original: gnyis dag skyur rtsub shuktoo'o //🔽sh'i ti dkar dang dkar nag 'dres //
analyzed: gnyis dag skyur rtsub shuktoo'o // sh'i ti dkar dang dkar nag 'dres //
translated: śīta, cold, and🔽sat, good, and🔽pūrāskṛta, honoured, and🔽grata, in front, and

original: legs dang yod dang dge ba dang // phan byed bden pa rnams la sa ta //
analyzed: legs dang yod dang dge ba dang // phan byed bden pa rnams la sa ta //
translated: kṛta, done, and🔽nivāta, windless, and🔽vāśra, as long as, and🔽śraṣṭā, creator, and🔽rabhedya, to be split, and🔽ca, and🔽jāto, born, and🔽dvapara, dvapara age, and🔽syur, they will be, and🔽ucchritā, raised, and

original: pur skri ta mchod pa dang // dgra dang mngon par rigs pa dang // mngon du bya ba rnams la'o //
analyzed: pur skri ta mchod pa dang // dgra dang mngon par rigs pa dang // mngon du bya ba rnams la'o //
translated: utthitā, arisen, and🔽astam, gone to rest, and

original: ni b'a ta ni rlung med gnas //
analyzed: ni b'a ta ni rlung med gnas //
translated: vidhim, method, and

original: barmma ya tra //
analyzed: barmma ya tra //
translated: prāyo, mostly, and🔽dyotayanti, they illuminate, and🔽utpannā, arisen, and🔽ādriyante, they are respected, and

original: dz'a tonna dva pr'adbaddh'a: syu ru tstshri t'a autthi t'astva m'i //
analyzed: dz'a tonna dva pr'adbaddh'a: syu ru tstshri t'a autthi t'astva m'i //
translated: sādāra, with a companion, and🔽ārcitā, worshipped, and🔽ca, and🔽iti, thus, and🔽śrī, glory, and🔽śrīmān, glorious, and🔽prāyo, mostly, and

original: briddhi matpro dya to tpann'a a'a dri too s'a d'a r'artsi too //
analyzed: briddhi matpro dya to tpann'a a'a dri too s'a d'a r'artsi too //
translated: dyotayanti, they illuminate, and🔽utpannā, arisen, and🔽ādriyante,

original: aartho& bhe dhi ya ree bastu pra yo dza na ni britti shu //
analyzed: aartho& bhe dhi ya ree bastu pra yo dza na ni britti shu //
translated: Arthobhidheyarevastu prayojanani vrittiśu.

original: ni d'a n'a ga ma yost'irtha mri shi dzushta dza le gu roo //
analyzed: ni d'a n'a ga ma yost'irtha mri shi dzushta dza le gu roo //
translated: Nidānāgamāyostīrthamṛṣijustajalā guroḥ.

original: sa marthastri mtshon gyis mi chod go cha la'ang //
analyzed: sa marthastri mtshon gyis mi chod go cha la'ang //
translated: Samarthastri-

original: dz'a ti skyes dang 'tsho ba thob //
analyzed: dz'a ti skyes dang 'tsho ba thob //
translated: jātiḥ, jīvitaṃ, lābhasatkāraśca.

original: autstshri t'a dang autthit'a //
analyzed: autstshri t'a dang autthit'a //
translated: Utsṛṣṭiḥ, utthānaṃ ca.

original: mtho dang shar phyogs skye ba rnams //
analyzed: mtho dang shar phyogs skye ba rnams //
translated: Uccakulodbhavaḥ, pūrvācāryānujñātaśca.

original: a'a dri too ni gus dang mchod //
analyzed: a'a dri too ni gus dang mchod //
translated: Ādaraḥ, pūjā ca.

original: ta mtha'o // aartha brjod bya dang ni nor //
analyzed: ta mtha'o // aartha brjod bya dang ni nor //
translated: Tamantāḥ. Arthavācakaḥ, dhanavān,

original: dngos po dgos pa ltogs pa la //
analyzed: dngos po dgos pa ltogs pa la //
translated: vastu, prayojanaṃ, kṣudhitaśca.

original: t'irtha gleng gzhi lung dang ni //
analyzed: t'irtha gleng gzhi lung dang ni //
translated: Tīrthaṃ, nidānaṃ, āgamaśca.

original: drang srong mu stegs lci ba'o //
analyzed: drang srong mu stegs lci ba'o //
translated: ṛṣiḥ, tīrthaṃ, guruḥ, gurujanāśca.

original: sa martha shu shaktishthi sambaddh'arthe hi te pi tsa //
analyzed: sa martha shu shaktishthi sambaddh'arthe hi te pi tsa //
translated: Samarthastuśaktisthī sambaddhārthe hite'pi ca.

original: da sha m'i stho ksh'i na r'a ga briddho b'i thi pa da bya pi //
analyzed: da sha m'i stho ksh'i na r'a ga briddho b'i thi pa da bya pi //
translated: Daśamī sthokṣaṇārāgabṛddho vīthipadavyāpi.

original: a'asth'a n'i yatna yo r'asth'a prasthonyastr'i p'a nu m'a na yo: //
analyzed: a'asth'a n'i yatna yo r'asth'a prasthonyastr'i p'a nu m'a na yo: //
translated: Āsthānīyatano'rāsthāprasthānyastrīpāṇumānyaḥ.

original: aa bhi pr'a ya ba shootstshand'a babdoo dz'i m'u ta bat+sa ro: //
analyzed: aa bhi pr'a ya ba shootstshand'a babdoo dz'i m'u ta bat+sa ro: //
translated: Abhipraya, avasah, ucchanda, avado, jimat, avatara.

original: aa ba b'a doo tu nind'a dznya d'a ya doo su ta b'andha gsum nus pa dang // 'dod pa 'brel don phan pa la'ang //🔽da sha m'i stho chags nyams rgan //
analyzed: aa ba b'a doo tu nind'a dznya d'a ya doo su ta b'andha gsum nus pa dang // 'dod pa 'brel don phan pa la'ang // da sha m'i stho chags nyams rgan //
translated: Avavadati, tunindati, jadayati, dadayati, sutavan-dhat.

original: b'i thi lam dang rtsig pa la //
analyzed: b'i thi lam dang rtsig pa la //
translated: Dashas, mistha, sthana, chags, nyams, rgan.🔽Vithilam, dhikara.🔽Asthana, sthana, abha.

original: a'asth'a gnas dang 'bad pa dag / prastha ri sul dang ni be //
analyzed: a'asth'a gnas dang 'bad pa dag / prastha ri sul dang ni be //
translated: Prastha, ri, sul, and va.

original: tha mtha'o // dgongs can dbang byed tstshanda'o //
analyzed: tha mtha'o // dgongs can dbang byed tstshanda'o //
translated: Tha, mtha', dgongs can, dbang byed, tsanda.

original: aa bdo char sprin be'u la'o //
analyzed: aa bdo char sprin be'u la'o //
translated: Avado, char, sprin, be'u la.

original: aa ba b'a doo smod dang bka' //
analyzed: aa ba b'a doo smod dang bka' //
translated: Avavadati, smad, dang, bka'.

original: d'a ya doo ni bu dang @224b boo //
analyzed: d'a ya doo ni bu dang @224b boo //
translated: Dadayati, ni, bu dang, bo.

original: p'a d'a rasmyam ghri tur++y'am shashtsandr'agnyark'asta mo nu d'a: //
analyzed: p'a d'a rasmyam ghri tur++y'am shashtsandr'agnyark'asta mo nu d'a: //
translated: Pada, arsyam, ghrishti, uryam, shashanchandra, agnyakashta, monu.

original: nirb'a do dza na b'a de pi sh'a do dzamb'a ya shashpa yo: //
analyzed: nirb'a do dza na b'a de pi sh'a do dzamb'a ya shashpa yo: //
translated: Nirvada, janavada, pishashu, jambhayashpa.

original: s'a r'a be ru di ti tr'a tar++y'a kra ndo d'a rune ra ne //
analyzed: s'a r'a be ru di ti tr'a tar++y'a kra ndo d'a rune ra ne //
translated: Sarav, avirudita, tirat, tri, kranta, dharunera.

original: sy'atpra s'a donyanu ro dhe pi s'u d'a: sy'adbyanydza ne pi tsa //
analyzed: sy'atpra s'a donyanu ro dhe pi s'u d'a: sy'adbyanydza ne pi tsa //
translated: Sya, atprasada, nyurodhe, pishu, sudha, sya, dbyun-dze, ne, pi.

original: goshth'a dhyakshe pi go bindo harshe py'a mo da banma da: //
analyzed: goshth'a dhyakshe pi go bindo harshe py'a mo da banma da: //
translated: Gostha, adhyaksha, api, go, vind, harasha, yatra, moha, vanam, ca.

original: pra dh'a n+ye ra dza lingge tsa gnyen ;🔽/ p'a da 'od zer zhabs bzhi cha //🔽ta mo nu da me nyi zla //🔽ni rb'a da ni skye bos smod //🔽sh'a do 'dam dang myu gu'o //🔽sgra bcas du skad skyob pa rnams //🔽a'a kranda'o drag pa'i g-yul //🔽pra s'a da ni dad pa'o //
analyzed: pra dh'a n+ye ra dza lingge tsa gnyen ; / p'a da 'od zer zhabs bzhi cha // ta mo nu da me nyi zla // ni rb'a da ni skye bos smod // sh'a do 'dam dang myu gu'o // sgra bcas du skad skyob pa rnams // a'a kranda'o drag pa'i g-yul // pra s'a da ni dad pa'o //
translated: Pradyot, rajas, lingi, ca, gnyen.

original: s'u da za ster spags la yang //🔽ru dpon brdzi go binda //🔽dga' dang chang la ma da na //🔽gtso bo dang ni rgyal po'i bri sh'adge ka ku do& stri y'am //🔽stri sambiddzny'a na sam bh'a sh'a kri ya k'a r'a dza na ma su: //🔽dharme ra ha syu pa ni sh'at+sy'a tri to bat+sa re sha rat //🔽pa dam by'a ba si tam tr'a na sth'a na laksham hri bastu shu //
analyzed: s'u da za ster spags la yang //🔽ru dpon brdzi go binda //🔽dga' dang chang la ma da na //🔽gtso bo dang ni rgyal po'i bri sh'adge ka ku do& stri y'am //🔽stri sambiddzny'a na sam bh'a sh'a kri ya k'a r'a dza na ma su: //🔽dharme ra ha syu pa ni sh'at+sy'a tri to bat+sa re sha rat //🔽pa dam by'a ba si tam tr'a na sth'a na laksham hri bastu shu //
translated: Pada, ojas, vishva, chatra, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, aruna, padma, ar

original: goshpa dam se bi te m'a ne pra tashth'a kri tya m'a sy'a rtags //
analyzed: goshpa dam se bi te m'a ne pra tashth'a kri tya m'a sy'a rtags //
translated: Gośpada, dam, se, vita, mane, praṣṭhaka, kṛtya, māsyā.

original: khyu mchog nog rnams ka ku dan //
analyzed: khyu mchog nog rnams ka ku dan //
translated: Kakudanta, the best of the herd,

original: sam bid mo'o mkhyen pa dang // phebs smra bya byed g-yul ming rnams //
analyzed: sam bid mo'o mkhyen pa dang // phebs smra bya byed g-yul ming rnams //
translated: Samvid, moha, upa, jñāna, and prabhāṣa, kriyā, yuddha, nāma.

original: chos dben au pa ni sh'a da //
analyzed: chos dben au pa ni sh'a da //
translated: Dharma, viveka, upa, niṣāda,

original: ston ka lo ni sha ra dang // pa dam so no ma skyob pa dang // gnas dang phun tshogs rkang pa dngos //
analyzed: ston ka lo ni sha ra dang // pa dam so no ma skyob pa dang // gnas dang phun tshogs rkang pa dngos //
translated: śara, śarad, pāda, soma, nātha, sthāna, sampat, pada, bhūta.

original: goshpa dam ni zhabs thog sred //
analyzed: goshpa dam ni zhabs thog sred //
translated: Gośpada, dam, śreṣṭha,

original: rab gnas thob pa a'a dam ;
analyzed: rab gnas thob pa a'a dam ;
translated: āpta, prāpta, ādāna,

original: / tri shvishta ma dhu roo sv'a d'u mri du ts'a t'ikshna ko ma loo //
analyzed: / tri shvishta ma dhu roo sv'a d'u mri du ts'a t'ikshna ko ma loo //
translated: triṣv abhiṣṭa, madhuro, svādu, amṛta, duḥkhā, tīkṣṇa, koma(la).

original: m'u dh'a lp'a pa tu nirbh'a gy'a manda: syurdvo tusha r'a doo //🔽pra tya gr'a pra ti bhoo bi dvat+su pra galbhoo bi sha ra doo //
analyzed: m'u dh'a lp'a pa tu nirbh'a gy'a manda: syurdvo tusha r'a doo // pra tya gr'a pra ti bhoo bi dvat+su pra galbhoo bi sha ra doo //
translated: mūḍha, lupta, patita, nirbhāga, gāya, syur dvau, utsuka, rāga.🔽pratyagra, prativandita, vidvatsa, upagupta, viśārada.

original: by'a mo ba dhashtsa n+ya gro dh'a but+se dha k'a ya aunna ta //
analyzed: by'a mo ba dhashtsa n+ya gro dh'a but+se dha k'a ya aunna ta //
translated: vyāma, udbhava, tathā, anya, grāha, buddhi, ṛddhi, kāya, unnata.

original: par+ya h'a rashtsa m'arggashtsa b'i sy'a dam //
analyzed: par+ya h'a rashtsa m'arggashtsa b'i sy'a dam //
translated: paryāya, hāsa, ca, mārga, gacchati, svayaṃ, dāma.

original: yid 'ong sbrang rtsi sv'a d'u'o //
analyzed: yid 'ong sbrang rtsi sv'a d'u'o //
translated: Madhu, svādu.

original: mri du rno dang 'jam pa dag / rmongs dang nyung dang mi gsal dang // skal ba ngan rnams manda'o //
analyzed: mri du rno dang 'jam pa dag / rmongs dang nyung dang mi gsal dang // skal ba ngan rnams manda'o //
translated: and manda is used to mean slow, small, and unclear.

original: sha r'a doo ni rtse mo gnyen //
analyzed: sha r'a doo ni rtse mo gnyen //
translated: The word nyagrodha is used for a banyan tree.

original: bi sh'a ra doo spobs can mkhas //🔽da mtha'o // 'dom dang shing la n+ya gro dha //
analyzed: bi sh'a ra doo spobs can mkhas // da mtha'o // 'dom dang shing la n+ya gro dha //
translated: The word viśārada is used for a skilled person.

original: aut+se dhani lus dang mtho //
analyzed: aut+se dhani lus dang mtho //
translated: The word utse-dha is used for a high body.

original: len byed lam ni b'i ba dhoo //🔽bi @225a * //
analyzed: len byed lam ni b'i ba dhoo // bi @225a * //
translated: The word vāpradhā is used for a path.

original: ba dhoo bi ba dhoo tsa too //
analyzed: ba dhoo bi ba dhoo tsa too //
translated: The word vi-vāpradhā is used for a non-path.🔽The word paridhva is used for a chariot, and the word śākhā is used for a branch.

original: pa ri dhir++ya dznyi ya ta ro: sh'a kh'a ya mu pa s'urya ke / bandha kam bya sa nam tse ta: p'i d'a dhishth'a na m'a dha ya: //
analyzed: pa ri dhir++ya dznyi ya ta ro: sh'a kh'a ya mu pa s'urya ke / bandha kam bya sa nam tse ta: p'i d'a dhishth'a na m'a dha ya: //
translated: The word upasūrya is used for a sun-like person, and the word bandhaka is used for a fettered mind.

original: syu: sa martha na n'i b'a ka ni y'a mashtsa sa m'a dha ya: //
analyzed: syu: sa martha na n'i b'a ka ni y'a mashtsa sa m'a dha ya: //
translated: The word samādhi is used for a concentration, and the word samāhita is used for a concentrated person.

original: do shotp'a do& nu bandha sy'atpra kri ty'a di shva na sva * //🔽ba dhoo yang de bzhin no //🔽pa ri dhi ni mchod sbyin gyi //
analyzed: do shotp'a do& nu bandha sy'atpra kri ty'a di shva na sva * // ba dhoo yang de bzhin no // pa ri dhi ni mchod sbyin gyi //
translated: The word doṣa is used for a fault, and the word anu-bandha is used for a natural friend.🔽The word vāpradhā is used for a path, and the word vi-vāpradhā is used for a non-path.

original: stod phur sh'a kh'a nye 'khor ro //
analyzed: stod phur sh'a kh'a nye 'khor ro //
translated: The word paridhva is used for a chariot, and the word śākhā is used for a branch.

original: rteng ba nyes dang sems nad dang // byin gyis brlab pa aa dhi'o //
analyzed: rteng ba nyes dang sems nad dang // byin gyis brlab pa aa dhi'o //
translated: The root, the fault, the mind, and the consecration.

original: mnyam don sa bon dag dang ni //
analyzed: mnyam don sa bon dag dang ni //
translated: The meaning of equality, the seed, and the pure.

original: nges pa rnams la sa m'a dhi //
analyzed: nges pa rnams la sa m'a dhi //
translated: The certainties are in the samādhi.

original: nyes skye au nu ban da dang // rang bzhin la sogs re //🔽mu khy'a nu p'a yi ni si shoo pra kri ta sy'a nu bartta ne //
analyzed: nyes skye au nu ban da dang // rang bzhin la sogs re // mu khy'a nu p'a yi ni si shoo pra kri ta sy'a nu bartta ne //
translated: The fault, the birth, the unavailing, and the nature, etc.🔽The end, the following, the non-existence, the nature, and the engagement.

original: bi dhurbishno tsandra ma shi pa ritstshe de bi le ba dhi: //
analyzed: bi dhurbishno tsandra ma shi pa ritstshe de bi le ba dhi: //
translated: The viḍhu, Viṣṇu, the moon, the body, the desire, and the consecration.

original: bi dhirbi dh'a ne dee be yi pra ni dhi: pr'artha ne tsa re //
analyzed: bi dhirbi dh'a ne dee be yi pra ni dhi: pr'artha ne tsa re //
translated: The viḍhi, the establishment, the divine, the certainty, the seeking, and the practice.

original: buddha bri ddhoo pandi te pi skandha: sa mu da ye pi tsa //
analyzed: buddha bri ddhoo pandi te pi skandha: sa mu da ye pi tsa //
translated: The buddha, the old, the wise, the aggregate, and the samudaya.🔽The deśa, the va, the ad, the svarita, the udātta, and the anudātta.

original: de she ba da dbyangs med dang // gtso bo rjes su 'gro ba dang // byis pa rang bzhin rjes 'gro'o //
analyzed: de she ba da dbyangs med dang // gtso bo rjes su 'gro ba dang // byis pa rang bzhin rjes 'gro'o //
translated: The principal, the following, and the childish, the natural following.

original: bi dhu khyab 'jug zla ba'o //🔽yongs gcod khung bu aa ba dhi //
analyzed: bi dhu khyab 'jug zla ba'o // yongs gcod khung bu aa ba dhi //
translated: The viḍhu, Viṣṇu, the moon.🔽The determination, the well, the consecration.

original: bi dhi sgrub dang sngon gyi las //🔽pra ni dhi ni don gnyer spyod/.....(slong mo zer/) / buddha rgan dang mkhas pa la //
analyzed: bi dhi sgrub dang sngon gyi las //🔽pra ni dhi ni don gnyer spyod/.....(slong mo zer/) / buddha rgan dang mkhas pa la //
translated: The viḍhi, the establishment, the former action.🔽The certainty, the seeking, the practice. The buddha, the old, the wise, the aggregate, and the samudaya.

original: skan dha yang dag tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: skan dha yang dag tshogs pa'o //
translated: Skandha is a collection.🔽Sindhu is a river.🔽Vidhi is a rite.

original: aabdhoo gtsang po bi she dhi& bdhoo sindhurn'a sa ri ti str'i y'am //🔽bi dh'a bi dhoo pra ka re tsa s'a dhu ramme pi tsa tri shu //
analyzed: aabdhoo gtsang po bi she dhi& bdhoo sindhurn'a sa ri ti str'i y'am // bi dh'a bi dhoo pra ka re tsa s'a dhu ramme pi tsa tri shu //
translated: Sadhu is good.🔽Vadhura is a young wife.

original: ba dh'urdz'a y'astu sh'astr'i tsa su dh'a le po& mri tam sbu h'i //
analyzed: ba dh'urdz'a y'astu sh'astr'i tsa su dh'a le po& mri tam sbu h'i //
translated: Sudha is nectar.

original: sam dh'a pra ti dzny'a mar++y'a d'a shradh'a sam pra tya ya: spri h'a //
analyzed: sam dh'a pra ti dzny'a mar++y'a d'a shradh'a sam pra tya ya: spri h'a //
translated: Samdhaya is a pledge.🔽Madhu is honey.

original: ma dhu ma dye pushpa ra se kshoo dre& ndhantu ta ma sya pi //
analyzed: ma dhu ma dye pushpa ra se kshoo dre& ndhantu ta ma sya pi //
translated: Andha is blind.🔽 Translation: Skandha is a collection.

original: yul bye brag / sin dhu cha phran la 'o mo //
analyzed: yul bye brag / sin dhu cha phran la 'o mo //
translated: Sindhu is a river.

original: bi dh'a bi dhi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: bi dh'a bi dhi rnam pa'o //
translated: Vidhi is a rite.

original: s'a dhu dga' dang legs pa la //
analyzed: s'a dhu dga' dang legs pa la //
translated: Sadhu is good.

original: ba dh'u bud med mna' ma chung //
analyzed: ba dh'u bud med mna' ma chung //
translated: Vadhura is a young wife.

original: su dh'a byug pa bdud rtsi sngon //🔽sam dh'a dam 'cha' yul chos so //
analyzed: su dh'a byug pa bdud rtsi sngon // sam dh'a dam 'cha' yul chos so //
translated: Sudha is nectar.

original: shradh'a blo dang 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: shradh'a blo dang 'dod pa'o //
translated: Samdhaya is a pledge.

original: ma dhu chang dang me tog bcud //
analyzed: ma dhu chang dang me tog bcud //
translated: Madhu is honey.

original: sbrang rtsi'o aandha long ba mun //
analyzed: sbrang rtsi'o aandha long ba mun //
translated: Andha is blind.

original: @225b aa tastri shu mamunnaddho pandi tam ma n+ya garbi too //
analyzed: @225b aa tastri shu mamunnaddho pandi tam ma n+ya garbi too //
translated: Atas tri-shu mumunda dho pandi tam manya garvita to'u.

original: brahma bandhu ra dhi kshe pe nirde she& th'a ba lambi ta: //
analyzed: brahma bandhu ra dhi kshe pe nirde she& th'a ba lambi ta: //
translated: Brahma bandhu radhi kshepe nirdese'tha valambitaḥ.

original: aa bi d'u ro pya bashtabdho pra siddhoo khy'a ta bh'u shi too //
analyzed: aa bi d'u ro pya bashtabdho pra siddhoo khy'a ta bh'u shi too //
translated: Avi durupyabhadho 'pyasiddhau khyāta bhuśita to'u.

original: s'ur++ya ba hn'i tsi tra bh'a nu sa ha sra rasmi de b'a ka roo //
analyzed: s'ur++ya ba hn'i tsi tra bh'a nu sa ha sra rasmi de b'a ka roo //
translated: Suryavahni citra bhānu sahā sramis deva karo'o.

original: bh'u t'atm'a noo dh'a tri de ho m'urkha n'i tso pri thagdza noo //
analyzed: bh'u t'atm'a noo dh'a tri de ho m'urkha n'i tso pri thagdza noo //
translated: Bhūtātmano'udhatri deho murkhānī co prithagjanaḥ.

original: gr'a ba 'di nas gsum yin sa munna dhoo //
analyzed: gr'a ba 'di nas gsum yin sa munna dhoo //
translated: Graha va iti nasammuna dho'o.

original: mkhas pa'i nga rgyal khengs pa'o //
analyzed: mkhas pa'i nga rgyal khengs pa'o //
translated: Here, atā means pride of learning.🔽Brahma bandhu means deceitful teacher.

original: brahma ban dhu g-yo nges bstan //
analyzed: brahma ban dhu g-yo nges bstan //
translated: Radhi means demonstration.🔽Kshepa means throwing.🔽Nirdesa means instruction.🔽Atha means then.🔽Valambitaḥ means supported.🔽Avi means not.

original: brten dang ring min aa bashtabdhoo //
analyzed: brten dang ring min aa bashtabdhoo //
translated: Durupyabhadhaḥ means not easily defeated.🔽Pyasiddhau means if not accomplished.🔽Khyāta means famous.

original: pra sid dhoo ni grags dang rgyan //🔽dha mtha'o // tsi tra bh'a nu nyi ma me //
analyzed: pra sid dhoo ni grags dang rgyan // dha mtha'o // tsi tra bh'a nu nyi ma me //
translated: Bhuśitaḥ means ornamented.🔽To'u means and.🔽Suryavahni means sun and fire.

original: 'od stong can dang nyin mor byed //
analyzed: 'od stong can dang nyin mor byed //
translated: Citrabhānu means having a variegated light.🔽Sahā sramis means enduring together.🔽Deva karo'o means maker of gods.

original: bh'u t'atm'a noo gso byed lus //
analyzed: bh'u t'atm'a noo gso byed lus //
translated: Bhūtātmano'u means of the nature of elements.🔽Audhatri means arrogance.🔽Deha means body.🔽Murkhānī means foolish.

original: pri thagdza na rmongs dang dman //
analyzed: pri thagdza na rmongs dang dman //
translated: Co prithagjanaḥ means and the worldlings.🔽 Graha va iti nasammuna dho'o means graha.

original: gr'a b'a noo shee la p'a sh'a noo sa ra pakshi pa tri noo //
analyzed: gr'a b'a noo shee la p'a sh'a noo sa ra pakshi pa tri noo //
translated: Garuḍa, the son of Vinatā, and the son of Kaśyapa.

original: ta ru shee loo shi kha ri noo shi khi noo ba hni barhi noo //
analyzed: ta ru shee loo shi kha ri noo shi khi noo ba hni barhi noo //
translated: The son of Śiva, the son of Śukra, the son of Śukra, the son of Vahni, the son of Brahmā,

original: pra ti yatn'a bu bhoo lipso pa gra h'a pa tha s'a di noo //
analyzed: pra ti yatn'a bu bhoo lipso pa gra h'a pa tha s'a di noo //
translated: The son of Pratiyātna, the son of Lobha, the son of Pāpa, the son of Graha, the son of Apas, the son of Sādhya,

original: dvoo s'a ra thi ha y'a ro hoo b'a dzi noo shvee shu pakshi na: //
analyzed: dvoo s'a ra thi ha y'a ro hoo b'a dzi noo shvee shu pakshi na: //
translated: The son of Dviṣa, the son of Sārathī, the son of Hayarohita, the son of Vājin, the son of Śvetapukṣa,

original: ku le pya bhi dza no dzamma bh'u m'a ba pya tha h'a ya n'a: //
analyzed: ku le pya bhi dza no dzamma bh'u m'a ba pya tha h'a ya n'a: //
translated: The son of Kula, the son of Abhijña, the son of Jambhumān, the son of Vāpī, the son of Hāyana,

original: barsh'a rtsi br'i hi bhe noo ni ri dang rdo //
analyzed: barsh'a rtsi br'i hi bhe noo ni ri dang rdo //
translated: The son of Varṣa, the son of Rṣi, the son of Bheṇa, the son of Nirī, the son of Dardura,

original: bya dang mda' la pa tri noo //

translated: The Veda is the Brahman, the Brahman is the Veda, the Veda is in the Brahman, the Brahman is in the Veda.🔽The tree is the woman, the woman is the tree, the tree is in the woman, the woman is in the tree.🔽 The skin is the body, the body is the skin, the skin is in the body, the body is in the skin.🔽 The tongue is below, the tongue is above, the tongue is in the body, the body is in the tongue.🔽 The sacrifice is not the sacrifice, the sacrifice is the sacrifice, the sacrifice is in the sacrifice, the sacrifice is in the sacrificer.🔽 Then the Ketana is accomplished.🔽The banner is near, the banner is far, the banner is in the body, the body is in the banner.🔽 The Veda is the truth, the Veda is the penance, the Veda is the Brahman, the Brahman is the Brahmana, the Brahman is the lord of creatures.🔽 The ornament is the ornament, the ornament is the ornament, the ornament is in the ornament, the ornament is in the body.🔽 The truth is the truth, the truth is the truth, the truth is in the truth, the truth is in the truthful.🔽 The vow is the vow, the vow is the vow, the vow is in the vow, the vow is in the vow-holder.🔽 The world is the world, the world is the world, the world is in the world, the world is in the world.🔽 The battle is the battle, the battle is the battle, the battle is in the battle, the battle is in the warrior.🔽 The heaven is the heaven, the heaven is the heaven, the heaven is in the heaven, the heaven is in the one who has gone to heaven.🔽 The hell is the hell, the hell is the hell, the hell is in the hell, the hell is in the sinner.🔽 The good deed is the good deed, the good deed is the good deed, the good deed is in the good deed, the good deed is in the one who has done good deeds.🔽 The bad deed is the bad deed, the bad deed is the bad deed, the bad deed is in the bad deed, the bad deed is in the one who has done bad deeds.🔽 The good is

analyzed: a'atstsh'a da ne sam pi dh'a na ma pa r'a na mi tyu bhe //

analyzed: ratnam sva dz'a ti shreshthe pi ba ne sha li la k'a na ne // ta li nam be ra le sto ke b'a tsya lingganta * //

original: rtags dag pra dh'a nam //

analyzed: aa dhishth'a nam 'khor lo dang // mthu dang gnas rnams la yang ngo //

analyzed: ratnam rang rigs rin chen mchog / ba ne chu dang nags khrod do //

original: ta li nam ni 'thor dang nyung //
analyzed: ta li nam ni 'thor dang nyung //

original: brjod bya'i thotta re //
analyzed: brjod bya'i thotta re //

original: sy'a ma gsum yin 'phrog khyed nag / sh'ya ma ni sh'a //
analyzed: sy'a ma gsum yin 'phrog khyed nag / sh'ya ma ni sh'a //
translated: The three syllables are śa, ya, and ma.🔽The three syllables are la, la, and ma.🔽The three syllables are pu, tscha, and pu.🔽The three syllables are ṇḍa, śva, and bhū.

original: l'a l'a mam putstsha pund'a shva bh'u sha pr'a dh'a n+ya ke tu shu //
analyzed: l'a l'a mam putstsha pund'a shva bh'u sha pr'a dh'a n+ya ke tu shu //
translated: The three syllables are ṣa, ya, and ka.🔽The three syllables are ke, tu, and śu.🔽The three syllables are su, kṣa, and ma.

original: s'u kshma ma dhy'atma m'a py'a di pra dh'a ne pra tha mam tri shu //
analyzed: s'u kshma ma dhy'atma m'a py'a di pra dh'a ne pra tha mam tri shu //
translated: The three syllables are dhyā, ta, and ātma.

original: b'a moo balgu pra t'i boo dv'a ba dha moo n+y'u na kut+si too //🔽dz'ernnanytsa pa ri bhu ktanytsa y'a ta y'a ma mi dam dva yam //
analyzed: b'a moo balgu pra t'i boo dv'a ba dha moo n+y'u na kut+si too // dz'ernnanytsa pa ri bhu ktanytsa y'a ta y'a ma mi dam dva yam //
translated: The three syllables are ā, pā, and ya.

original: tu rlung dang mtshan mo'o //
analyzed: tu rlung dang mtshan mo'o //
translated: The three syllables are di, prā, and dhā.🔽The three syllables are na, tha, and ma.🔽The three syllables are tri, ṣu, and śa.🔽The three syllables are va, mo, and va.🔽The three syllables are ṅgu, prā, and ti.🔽The three syllables are bo, ḍva, and va.🔽The three syllables are dha, mo, and ṇya.

original: l'a l'a mam ni mjug ma dang // mdongs dang rta rgyan gtso bo tog / ksha lhag pa yi bdag kyang ngo //🔽dang po gtso bo pra tha ma //
analyzed: l'a l'a mam ni mjug ma dang // mdongs dang rta rgyan gtso bo tog / ksha lhag pa yi bdag kyang ngo // dang po gtso bo pra tha ma //
translated: The three syllables are ku, tsu, and to.🔽The three syllables are ja, er, and ṇ.🔽The three syllables are ṇya, tsa, and pari.

original: gsum / b'a ma kyog po pra t'i pa /
analyzed: gsum / b'a ma kyog po pra t'i pa /
translated: The three syllables are bhu, kta, and ṇya.🔽The three syllables are ca, ya, and tā.

original: gnyis // aa ba dha ma ma gang smad //🔽rgas pa dang ni yongs su spyod //
analyzed: gnyis // aa ba dha ma ma gang smad // rgas pa dang ni yongs su spyod //
translated: The three syllables are ya, mā, and ma.🔽The three syllables are mi, da, and ma.

original: y'a ta y'a ma 'di gnyis so //🔽ma mtha'o // myur @228b radga ga ru doo t'a rkyoo ni la y'a ya tsa poo ksha yo //
analyzed: y'a ta y'a ma 'di gnyis so //🔽ma mtha'o // myur @228b radga ga ru doo t'a rkyoo ni la y'a ya tsa poo ksha yo //
translated: The three syllables are dvaya, ya, and tā.🔽The three syllables are tu, rṇa, and ya.🔽The three syllables are la, ya, and ṇa.🔽The three syllables are ya, ca, and po.🔽The three syllables are kṣa, ya, and yo.🔽The three syllables are ṇi, la, and ya.🔽The three syllables are ṭā, rgya, and do.🔽The three syllables are ṭa, rgya, and do.

original: shva shur++yo de ba ra shy'a lo bhr'a tri byoo dhr'a tri dza dvi shoo //
analyzed: shva shur++yo de ba ra shy'a lo bhr'a tri byoo dhr'a tri dza dvi shoo //
translated: Bṛhatphala, Avṛha, Atapa, Sudṛśa,

original: par++ya n+yoo ra sa dabdendra sy'a dar++ya: sv'a mi bee shya yo: //
analyzed: par++ya n+yoo ra sa dabdendra sy'a dar++ya: sv'a mi bee shya yo: //
translated: Sudarśana, Akaniṣṭha, and the gods of the Four Great Kings,🔽the Thirty-three, Yāma, Tuṣita, Nirmāṇarati,

original: ti shya: pu shye ka li yu ge par++y'a yo& ba sa re kra mee //
analyzed: ti shya: pu shye ka li yu ge par++y'a yo& ba sa re kra mee //
translated: Paranirmitavaśavartin, Brahmakāyika,🔽Brahmapurohita, Mahābrahma,🔽Parīttābha, Apramāṇābha, Ābhāsvara,🔽Parīttaśubha, Apramāṇaśubha, Śubhakṛtsna,

original: pra tya yo& dh'i na sha pa tha dzny'a na bam shv'a 'gro 'dab bzangs t'arkshyoo'o //🔽gnas dang nyams pa ksha ya'o //
analyzed: pra tya yo& dh'i na sha pa tha dzny'a na bam shv'a 'gro 'dab bzangs t'arkshyoo'o // gnas dang nyams pa ksha ya'o //

original: skud po gnyid mo shva shur++ya //
analyzed: skud po gnyid mo shva shur++ya //
translated: Avṛha, Atapa, Sudṛśa, Sudarśana,🔽Akanisṭha, and the gods of the Four Great Kings,🔽the Thirty-three, Yāma, Tuṣita, Nirmāṇarati,

original: spun skyes dgra ni bh'a tri byoo //
analyzed: spun skyes dgra ni bh'a tri byoo //
translated: Paranirmitavaśavartin, Brahmakāyika,🔽Brahmapurohita, Mahābrahma,🔽Parīttābha, Apramāṇābha, Ābhāsvara,🔽Parīttaśubha, Apramāṇaśubha, Śubhakṛtsna,

original: par++ya n+yoo ni 'brug sprin dbang //
analyzed: par++ya n+yoo ni 'brug sprin dbang //
translated: Anabhraka, Puṇyaprasava, Bṛhatphala,

original: aar++ya bdag bo rje rigs so //
analyzed: aar++ya bdag bo rje rigs so //
translated: Avṛha, Atapa, Sudṛśa, Sudarśana,🔽Akanisṭha, and the gods of the Four Great Kings,

original: ti shya rgyal dang rtsod ldan dus //🔽par++y'a ya ni gnas skabs rim //
analyzed: ti shya rgyal dang rtsod ldan dus // par++y'a ya ni gnas skabs rim //
translated: the Thirty-three, Yāma, Tuṣita, Nirmāṇarati,🔽Paranirmitavaśavartin, Brahmakāyika,🔽Brahmapurohita, Mahābrahma,🔽Parīttābha, Apramāṇābha, Ābhāsvara,🔽Parīttaśubha, Apramāṇaśubha, Śubhakṛtsna,🔽Anabhraka, Puṇyaprasava, Bṛhatphala,

original: pra tya ni gzhan dbang dang // mna' dang shes pa yid chos dang// sa he tu shu //
analyzed: pra tya ni gzhan dbang dang // mna' dang shes pa yid chos dang// sa he tu shu //
translated: Avṛha, Atapa, Sudṛśa, Sudarśana,🔽Akanisṭha, and the gods of the Four Great Kings,🔽the Thirty-three, Yāma, Tuṣita, Nirmāṇarati,

original: ranbhra shapde th'a nu sha yo d'irgha dve sh'a nu t'a pa yo: //
analyzed: ranbhra shapde th'a nu sha yo d'irgha dve sh'a nu t'a pa yo: //
translated: Paranirmitavaśavartin

original: sth'u lotstsa yastva s'a ka lye n'a g'a n'am ma dhya me ga te //
analyzed: sth'u lotstsa yastva s'a ka lye n'a g'a n'am ma dhya me ga te //
translated: Sthaulaccaya, satva, saka, lyena, naganam, madhyame gate.

original: sa ma y'a: sha pa th'a ts'a ra k'a la siddh'anta sambi da: //
analyzed: sa ma y'a: sha pa th'a ts'a ra k'a la siddh'anta sambi da: //
translated: Samaya, shapata, chara, kala, siddhanta, sambida.

original: bya sa n'a dya shu bham dee bam bi pa di tya na y'astra ya: //
analyzed: bya sa n'a dya shu bham dee bam bi pa di tya na y'astra ya: //
translated: Vyasana, adya, shubham, devan, vipadityanayastraya.

original: aa tya yo& ti kra rgyu dang bug sgra la'o //
analyzed: aa tya yo& ti kra rgyu dang bug sgra la'o //
translated: Attyaya, ati, krit, gati, and bhuj, in a cause and a hole.

original: de nas aa nu sha ya ni //
analyzed: de nas aa nu sha ya ni //
translated: Then anushaya, ni.

original: yun ring zhe sdang rjes su gdung //
analyzed: yun ring zhe sdang rjes su gdung //
translated: Long-lasting, hatred, and subsequent torment.

original: sth'u lotstsa ya ma tshang dang // glang chen 'bring du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: sth'u lotstsa ya ma tshang dang // glang chen 'bring du spyod pa'o //
translated: Sthaulaccaya, in a gathering, and an elephant, in the middle, to be used.

original: sa ma ya ni mna' dang sbyod //
analyzed: sa ma ya ni mna' dang sbyod //
translated: Samaya, in an oath, and a practice.

original: dus dang grub mtha' yang dag rig / gnod sogs mi dge sngon las dang // phun sum tshogs min aa na ya //
analyzed: dus dang grub mtha' yang dag rig / gnod sogs mi dge sngon las dang // phun sum tshogs min aa na ya //
translated: Time, and a conclusion, and a correct understanding, and a harm, etc., non-virtue, and a previous action, and not perfect, and anaya.

original: aa tyo ni 'khyog pa dag /
analyzed: aa tyo ni 'khyog pa dag /
translated: Attyaya, in a crooked one, and a great one.

original: me kritstshra do she dande bya th'a pa di //🔽yuddh'a ya tyo: sampa b'a y'a: p'u dzyastu shva shu ro pi tsa //
analyzed: me kritstshra do she dande bya th'a pa di // yuddh'a ya tyo: sampa b'a y'a: p'u dzyastu shva shu ro pi tsa //
translated: Mekritsh, dosha, danda, vyatha, apati.🔽Yuddha, atyaya, samprava, ya, poojya, tushva, ropicha.

original: pashtsa da basth'a pi ba lam sa ma b'a pashtsa sanna yoo //
analyzed: pashtsa da basth'a pi ba lam sa ma b'a pashtsa sanna yoo //
translated: Paschata, davastha, api, valam, sama, vaapashchata, sannayoh.

original: sam gh'a te sa ni be she tsa sam sty'a ya: pra na y'astva ma'i //
analyzed: sam gh'a te sa ni be she tsa sam sty'a ya: pra na y'astva ma'i //
translated: Samghata, Tesa, Nivesa, Samasattva, Pranayasa,

original: bi shrambha y'atsny'a pre m'a no& bi ro sdug dang nyes pa chad las la //
analyzed: bi shrambha y'atsny'a pre m'a no& bi ro sdug dang nyes pa chad las la //
translated: Visrambha, Acchya, Premana, and Virodha.

original: de nas gnod dang 'thab mo dang // bu rgyud sampar'a ya'o //
analyzed: de nas gnod dang 'thab mo dang // bu rgyud sampar'a ya'o //
translated: Sampraaya is the family of children.

original: p'u dzya mchod 'os gyos po la'ang //
analyzed: p'u dzya mchod 'os gyos po la'ang //
translated: Puujya is the father-in-law.

original: sanna yoo ni dpung rnams kyi //
analyzed: sanna yoo ni dpung rnams kyi //
translated: Sannaya is the army.

original: phyir sdod rgyab na gnas rnams so //
analyzed: phyir sdod rgyab na gnas rnams so //
translated: Pratishthana is the rear.

original: tshogs dang 'jug rtsol sam sty'a ya //
analyzed: tshogs dang 'jug rtsol sam sty'a ya //
translated: Samasattva is the assembly.

original: pra na ya ni 'di rnams te //
analyzed: pra na ya ni 'di rnams te //
translated: Pranaya is these.

original: yid ches slong mo yid gcugs rnams //
analyzed: yid ches slong mo yid gcugs rnams //
translated: Visvasa is confidence, bhedaya is dissension,

original: @229a * // dhe& pi sa mutstshra ya: //
analyzed: @229a * // dhe& pi sa mutstshra ya: //
translated: and samutsarya is the separation of the mind.

original: bi sha yo ya sya yodzny'a tasta tra shapd'a di ke shva bi //
analyzed: bi sha yo ya sya yodzny'a tasta tra shapd'a di ke shva bi //
translated: Vishayoya is the knowledge of that, tatra is the word, etc.

original: nir++y'a se pi ka sh'a yonyastr'i sa bh'a y'anytsa pra ti shra ya: //🔽pr'a yo bh'u mn+yanta ga me ne ma n+yu dee n+ye kra too kru dhi //
analyzed: nir++y'a se pi ka sh'a yonyastr'i sa bh'a y'anytsa pra ti shra ya: // pr'a yo bh'u mn+yanta ga me ne ma n+yu dee n+ye kra too kru dhi //
translated: Nirvasana is the destruction of desire.🔽Trayas is the protection of the three.🔽Prashraya is the arrival of the earth.

original: ra ha syo pasth'a yorgu hyam sa tyam sha pa tha ta thya yo: //
analyzed: ra ha syo pasth'a yorgu hyam sa tyam sha pa tha ta thya yo: //
translated: Rahasyopasthaya is the secret truth.

original: b'ir++yam * // sa mutstshra ya 'gal med kyang //🔽bi sha ya ni shes bya yi //🔽gang gi de la sgra sogs rnams //🔽dur kha bska ba ka sh'a ya //🔽'du khang pra ti shra ya'o //🔽pr'a yo phal cher mthar 'byin dang // ma n+yu mchod sbyin khro ba la //🔽gsang dang nyer gnas gu hyam'o //🔽sa tyam dag tshang bden pa'o //🔽b'ir++yam ba la pra bh'a bo tsa dra byambha bye gu n'a shra ye //🔽dhishtyam sth'a ne gri he bhegnoo bh'a gyam karmma shu bh'a shu bham //
analyzed: b'ir++yam * // sa mutstshra ya 'gal med kyang // bi sha ya ni shes bya yi // gang gi de la sgra sogs rnams // dur kha bska ba ka sh'a ya // 'du khang pra ti shra ya'o // pr'a yo phal cher mthar 'byin dang // ma n+yu mchod sbyin khro ba la // gsang dang nyer gnas gu hyam'o // sa tyam dag tshang bden pa'o // b'ir++yam ba la pra bh'a bo tsa dra byambha bye gu n'a shra ye // dhishtyam sth'a ne gri he bhegnoo bh'a gyam karmma shu bh'a shu bham //
translated: samuccayāya, “for the purpose of combining.”🔽viśeṣaṇe, “in the case of a particular object of knowledge.”🔽yatra śabdādayaḥ, “where there are words and so on.”🔽duḥkhaṃ kaṣāyaḥ, “suffering is a bitter substance.”🔽prāsaṅgikaḥ, “a consequentialist.”🔽prāyaḥ, “mostly.”🔽manye, “I think.”🔽krodhe, “in anger.”🔽guhyam, “secret.”🔽upasthāne, “in attendance.”🔽satyaṃ, “truth.”🔽viryaṃ balaṃ prabhāvaśca dravyambhavyaguṇāśraye |🔽dhṛtyā sthāne gṛhe bhogau bhagnau karma śubhāśubham || 1 ||🔽

original: dra byam skal ba yon tan gnas //
analyzed: dra byam skal ba yon tan gnas //
translated: Dṛṃ is for the abode of good fortune and qualities.

original: dhishtyam gnas khang glang po me //
analyzed: dhishtyam gnas khang glang po me //
translated: Dhṛṣṭa is for the abode of elephants.

original: bh'a gyam las dang dge mi dge rta dang gser ni g'am ge yam //
analyzed: bh'a gyam las dang dge mi dge rta dang gser ni g'am ge yam //

original: bi sha ly'a ni so ldan la'ang //
analyzed: bi sha ly'a ni so ldan la'ang //
translated: Viśāla is for those with teeth.

original: bri shtha ka y'a dpal goo r'i //
analyzed: bri shtha ka y'a dpal goo r'i //
translated: Bṛhatkāya is for glorious Gaurī.

original: aa bhi khy'a ni ming dang mdzes //
analyzed: aa bhi khy'a ni ming dang mdzes //
translated: Abhikhā is for name and beauty.

original: rtsom dang nges byed slob pa dang // mchod sam pra dh'a ra nam //🔽au p'a ya: karmma tsesht'a tsa tsa kit+s'a tsa na bkri y'a: //🔽tsh'a y'a s'urya pri y'a k'anti: pra ti bimba n'a ta pa: //🔽kakshy'a pra koshth'i harm'a de: k'atsyamma dhye bha bandha ne //🔽kri ty'a kri y'a de ba ta yostri shu bhe dye dha n'a di bhi: //🔽dang bsgrub bya ....(bgros pa zer/) thabs las sems //

original: gso dpyad dgu la kri y'a'o //
analyzed: gso dpyad dgu la kri y'a'o //
translated: Upāya, karma, cetas, citra, and kriyā are for the mind.

original: tsh'a ya nyi ma'i chung ma mdzes //
analyzed: tsh'a ya nyi ma'i chung ma mdzes //
translated: Tasyā is for the beloved beauty of the sun.

original: gzugs brnyan cha ba med rnams la'o //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan cha ba med rnams la'o //
translated: Pratibimba is for those without parts.🔽Kṣaya is for the treasury of the heart.🔽Kācyam is for the bondage of the mind.🔽Kṛtyakriyā is for the gods.🔽Tṛṣṇā is for the wealth of the three jewels.

original: ka kshy'a re mig bsil khang sogs //
analyzed: ka kshy'a re mig bsil khang sogs //
translated: Kakṣyā, Rekhā, and Vṛndā are the eyes, the pavilion, and so on.

original: rked rgyan glang chen dbus su 'ching //
analyzed: rked rgyan glang chen dbus su 'ching //
translated: The girdle is tied in the middle of the elephant.

original: kri ty'a bya ba lha dag gsum //
analyzed: kri ty'a bya ba lha dag gsum //
translated: Kṛtyā is the three gods.

original: dbye ba nor la sogs rnams kyis //
analyzed: dbye ba nor la sogs rnams kyis //
translated: The divisions are by wealth and so on.

original: @229b dza n+ya sy'adzdza na b'a de pi dza gha n+yonynto nya me pi tsa //
analyzed: @229b dza n+ya sy'adzdza na b'a de pi dza gha n+yonynto nya me pi tsa //
translated: Janyasya jjanavāde'pi jaganīyānti na mayi ca.

original: garhy'a dh'i noo tsa bakta byoo ka lyoo sadzdza ni r'a ma yoo //
analyzed: garhy'a dh'i noo tsa bakta byoo ka lyoo sadzdza ni r'a ma yoo //
translated: Garhyādhiṇośca vaktavyau kalyāṇo'sajjanīyāyoḥ.

original: a'atma b'a na nu pe torth'a darthyoo pu nyam tu ts'arba pi //
analyzed: a'atma b'a na nu pe torth'a darthyoo pu nyam tu ts'arba pi //
translated: Ātmavānanopetaśca arthyo'puṇyaṃ tu carvapi.

original: r'u pya: pra shastu r'u pe pi ba d'a n+yo balgu b'a ga pi //
analyzed: r'u pya: pra shastu r'u pe pi ba d'a n+yo balgu b'a ga pi //
translated: Rūpyāḥ prasthūrarūpe'pi vadānyo balagūpyapi.

original: n+y'a yy'a bi ma dhya: so myam tu sunda re sho ma de ba tee //
analyzed: n+y'a yy'a bi ma dhya: so myam tu sunda re sho ma de ba tee //
translated: Nyāyāvimadhyasomyaṃ tu sundareśomadevate.

original: dza n+ya skye bos smod pa'o //
analyzed: dza n+ya skye bos smod pa'o //
translated: Janya is censured by people.

original: dza gha n+yo ni mtha' yang bya //
analyzed: dza gha n+yo ni mtha' yang bya //
translated: Jaganīya is also an extreme.

original: ngan pa gzhan dbang bakta byoo //
analyzed: ngan pa gzhan dbang bakta byoo //
translated: Vaktavyau are bad and dependent.

original: ka lyoo nad med yon tan can //
analyzed: ka lyoo nad med yon tan can //
translated: Kalyāṇa is healthy and virtuous.

original: bdag ldan nor bral aarthyo'o //🔽pu nya yid du 'ong ba la'ang //
analyzed: bdag ldan nor bral aarthyo'o // pu nya yid du 'ong ba la'ang //
translated: Ātmavān is wealthy and poor.🔽Arthya is pleasant and meritorious.

original: r'u pya dga' dang gzugs la'o //
analyzed: r'u pya dga' dang gzugs la'o //
translated: Rūpyāḥ is delightful and beautiful.

original: ba d'a n+yo ni ngag mnyen pa //
analyzed: ba d'a n+yo ni ngag mnyen pa //
translated: Vadanya is a soft voice.

original: ma dhya bar ma rigs pa la //
analyzed: ma dhya bar ma rigs pa la //
translated: Madhya is the middle class.

original: so myam gdu bu zla ba lha //
analyzed: so myam gdu bu zla ba lha //
translated: Somya is a moon-like ornament.

original: bee sarbba dznya bhi sha dzoo bee dy'a b'atma k'a mashtsa hritstsha yoo //
analyzed: bee sarbba dznya bhi sha dzoo bee dy'a b'atma k'a mashtsa hritstsha yoo //
translated: Vaisarva-jña-bhisaj-jyo-vaidya-vatam-kām-hṛtsaya-yoḥ

original: pha la ka ly'a na yorbha byam yo gya sam pra ti ke tri shu //
analyzed: pha la ka ly'a na yorbha byam yo gya sam pra ti ke tri shu //
translated: Phalakalyāna-yorbhavyaṃ yogaṃ saṃprati-ke triṣu

original: ni ba h'a ba sa roo b'a roo sam sta roo pra sta r'a dhva roo //
analyzed: ni ba h'a ba sa roo b'a roo sam sta roo pra sta r'a dhva roo //
translated: Nibhā-vasaro-varo-saṃstara-u-pradhvaṃsa-dhva-roḥ

original: gu ru g'ishpa ti pi tr'a dyoo dv'a pa roo yu ga sam sha yoo //
analyzed: gu ru g'ishpa ti pi tr'a dyoo dv'a pa roo yu ga sam sha yoo //
translated: Guru-gīṣpati-pitrādyo dvāpara-yugasaṃśayaḥ🔽Prakāra-bheda-sādṛśya-iṣyate ākāra-vimukti-kāla-kūnmā

original: pra k'a ro bhe d'a s'a dri shye a'a k'a r'a bim gi dy'a kun mkhyen sman pa la //
analyzed: pra k'a ro bhe d'a s'a dri shye a'a k'a r'a bim gi dy'a kun mkhyen sman pa la //
translated: Sarvajña-vaidya-yoḥ

original: bdag dang 'dod pa hritstsha yoo //🔽bha bya dge dang 'bras bu la //
analyzed: bdag dang 'dod pa hritstsha yoo // bha bya dge dang 'bras bu la //
translated: Kām-hṛtsaya-yoḥ🔽Bhavya-śubha-phala-yoḥ

original: yo gya shin tu rigs pa la //🔽ya mtha'o // tshogs dang re mos b'a ra'o //
analyzed: yo gya shin tu rigs pa la // ya mtha'o // tshogs dang re mos b'a ra'o //
translated: Yogaṃ su-yukti-yoḥ🔽Ya-m-athā

original: sam sta roo ni mchod sbyin lam //
analyzed: sam sta roo ni mchod sbyin lam //
translated: Varo-varo-saṃstara-u-pradhvaṃsa-dhva-roḥ

original: gu ru phur bu phal sogs //🔽dv'a pa roo ni dus the tshom //
analyzed: gu ru phur bu phal sogs // dv'a pa roo ni dus the tshom //
translated: Guru-śukra-prabhṛti-yoḥ🔽Dvāpara-yugasaṃśayaḥ

original: pra k'a ra ni dbye ba dpe //
analyzed: pra k'a ra ni dbye ba dpe //
translated: Prakāra-bheda-sādṛśya-iṣyate ākāra-vimukti-kāla-kūnmā

original: a'a k'a ra ni lus ta krit'i //
analyzed: a'a k'a ra ni lus ta krit'i //
translated: Akara is the body, Takkita is

original: kim sh'a r'u dh'a n+ya sh'a ke shu ma ru dha nva dha roo //
analyzed: kim sh'a r'u dh'a n+ya sh'a ke shu ma ru dha nva dha roo //
translated: Kimsharudhanyshakeshumarudhanvaddha.

original: aa dra yo dru ma shee l'ark'a: str'i sta n'abdho pa yo dha roo //
analyzed: aa dra yo dru ma shee l'ark'a: str'i sta n'abdho pa yo dha roo //
translated: Adrayodrumahselarakhas, Satristhanabdhayo.

original: dhvant'a ri d'a na b'a pri t'a b'a li hast'am sha ba: ka r'a: //
analyzed: dhvant'a ri d'a na b'a pri t'a b'a li hast'am sha ba: ka r'a: //
translated: Dhvantaridavanapritavalihasthamashah, Karah.

original: pra da r'a bhangga n'a r'i rugb'a n'a aa sr'a: ka ts'a aa pi //
analyzed: pra da r'a bhangga n'a r'i rugb'a n'a aa sr'a: ka ts'a aa pi //
translated: Pradashabhangananarirugavanasaras, Kacchapi.

original: aa dz'a ta shringge goo: k'a le pya tshul byad //
analyzed: aa dz'a ta shringge goo: k'a le pya tshul byad //
translated: Ajatasringagoh, Kalepyashat.🔽Kimsharunigrama, Danda.

original: kim sh'a ru ni gra ma mda'/....(snye ma) / ma ru mya ngam thang dang ri //🔽aa dra shing dang ri nyi ma //
analyzed: kim sh'a ru ni gra ma mda'/....(snye ma) / ma ru mya ngam thang dang ri // aa dra shing dang ri nyi ma //
translated: Marudamardana, Parvata.🔽Adrakshi, Parvata.

original: pa yo dha ra nu ma sprin //🔽dhvant'a ri ni lha min 'khor //🔽dbya sdud lag pa 'od ka r'a //
analyzed: pa yo dha ra nu ma sprin // dhvant'a ri ni lha min 'khor // dbya sdud lag pa 'od ka r'a //

analyzed: pra da ra ni 'joms byed dang // bud med rked nad dang ni mda' // aa pra skra dang zur yin no //
translated: Dhvantaridavanapritavalihasthamashah, Karah.🔽Pradashabhangananarirugavanasaras, Kacchapi.

original: rva med ba lang dus @230a * //
analyzed: rva med ba lang dus @230a * //

original: aa pi h'a ro& bhi yo ge tsa tsoor++ye sannaha ni pi tsa //
analyzed: aa pi h'a ro& bhi yo ge tsa tsoor++ye sannaha ni pi tsa //
translated: Apiharo 'bhiyogotsauryasannāhani pichchaḥ.

original: sy'adzdzadga me pa r'i b'a ra: khadga ko she pa ritstsha de //
analyzed: sy'adzdzadga me pa r'i b'a ra: khadga ko she pa ritstsha de //
translated: Svajjadagame parivāraḥ, khadgakoshe paricchadaḥ.

original: bista roo bi ta p'i darbha mushti: p'i yang ngo //
analyzed: bista roo bi ta p'i darbha mushti: p'i yang ngo //
translated: Vistāraḥ vitapī dṛbhmamusṭiḥ, pīyūṣaḥ.

original: srog shing du ma bu sva ru'o //
analyzed: srog shing du ma bu sva ru'o //
translated: Prāṇaḥ śūnyo 'ruṇasya svarūḥ.

original: tha shal dang ni bskar //
analyzed: tha shal dang ni bskar //
translated: Dāridrayaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ ca.

original: a'a damba ra sil snyan dang // nyi ma glang chen dbang po'i sgra //
analyzed: a'a damba ra sil snyan dang // nyi ma glang chen dbang po'i sgra //
translated: Ādambaraṃ veṇuśaṅkhasvanāḥ sūryagajaindravāḥ.

original: aa pi h'a ra mngon sbyor dang // chom rkun go cha gyon pa la'ang //🔽ba ri b'a ra dag ba yang dang // ral gri'i shubs dang gos la'o //
analyzed: aa pi h'a ra mngon sbyor dang // chom rkun go cha gyon pa la'ang // ba ri b'a ra dag ba yang dang // ral gri'i shubs dang gos la'o //
translated: Apiharaṇam abhiyogaś caurāṇāṃ varmāṇaṃ ca.🔽Parivāraḥ paridhānaṃ ca khadgasya kośaḥ.

original: bista ro ni tshang tshing dang // ku sha'i th'a dya m'a sa nam //
analyzed: bista ro ni tshang tshing dang // ku sha'i th'a dya m'a sa nam //
translated: Vistāraḥ kuñjaḥ, kuśasthādyā māsanaṃ ca.

original: dv'a ri dv'a: sthe pra t'i h'a ra: pr'a ti h'ar++ya pya nanta re //
analyzed: dv'a ri dv'a: sthe pra t'i h'a ra: pr'a ti h'ar++ya pya nanta re //
translated: Dvāri dvārasthāḥ prātihāryāḥ pyantare.

original: bi pu lye na ku le bishnoo ba bhru: sy'atpingga le tri shu //
analyzed: bi pu lye na ku le bishnoo ba bhru: sy'atpingga le tri shu //
translated: Vipulye kulaviṣṇoḥ, babhruḥ syāt piṅgalas triśu.

original: s'a ro ba le sthi ram shi ba n+y'ayye kl'i bam ba re tri shu //
analyzed: s'a ro ba le sthi ram shi ba n+y'ayye kl'i bam ba re tri shu //
translated: Sārovale sthiraṃ śivānyāyye kālibhamare triśu.

original: du ro da rodyu ta ka re pa ni dy'u te du ro dar'am //
analyzed: du ro da rodyu ta ka re pa ni dy'u te du ro dar'am //
translated: Dūrordhvaṃ dūtakaraiḥ pāṇibhir dūtair dūrordhvaṃ dāmaṃ ca |

original: ma changs pa khri sogs stan //
analyzed: ma changs pa khri sogs stan //
translated: The seat of the gods is a lotus, of the demons a corpse, of men a throne, and so on.

original: sgo srung sgor gnas pra t'i h'ar //
analyzed: sgo srung sgor gnas pra t'i h'ar //
translated: The doorkeeper stands at the door with pratihāra.

original: pr'a ti h'ar++ya mtha' yas so //
analyzed: pr'a ti h'ar++ya mtha' yas so //
translated: Pratihāra is endless.

original: chen po ne'u le khyab 'jug dang // ba bhru yin te skya bo gsum //
analyzed: chen po ne'u le khyab 'jug dang // ba bhru yin te skya bo gsum //
translated: The three white ones are the great tortoise, Viṣṇu, and the babhru.

original: s'a ra dbung gnas cha shas dang // rigs pa ma ning mchog gsum mo //
analyzed: s'a ra dbung gnas cha shas dang // rigs pa ma ning mchog gsum mo //
translated: The three best are the part of the arm of the gods, the neuter of the sages, and the supreme of men.

original: du ro da ro sho byed dang // sho rgyal du ra da ram'o //
analyzed: du ro da ro sho byed dang // sho rgyal du ra da ram'o //
translated: Dūrordhvaṃ is the doing of the shoka, the victory of the shoka, and the dharmas of the dūra.

original: g-yul @230b h'a ra nye durga pa the k'ant'a ra: punna bum sa kam / matsha ro&amp ;🔽n+ya shu bha dve she tatbatkri pa na yo stri shu //🔽de b'addhri te ba ra: shreshthe tri shu kl'i bam ma n'a kpri ye //
analyzed: g-yul @230b h'a ra nye durga pa the k'ant'a ra: punna bum sa kam / matsha ro&amp ; n+ya shu bha dve she tatbatkri pa na yo stri shu // de b'addhri te ba ra: shreshthe tri shu kl'i bam ma n'a kpri ye //
translated: The battle is the difficult path of the relatives, the beloved of the full pot and the full basket.🔽The difficult path of the relatives is the path of the three difficult paths, the beloved of the full pot and the full basket.

original: bam sh'am ku re ka r'i ro& stra'i ta ru bhe de gha tre tsa n'a //
analyzed: bam sh'am ku re ka r'i ro& stra'i ta ru bhe de gha tre tsa n'a //
translated: The doing of the three difficult paths is the doing of the three difficult paths, the beloved of the full pot and the full basket.

original: n'a tsa m'u dza ga ma ha sta chen bgrod dka' lam dang ni //🔽skyes bu ma ning k'ant'a ra //
analyzed: n'a tsa m'u dza ga ma ha sta chen bgrod dka' lam dang ni //🔽skyes bu ma ning k'ant'a ra //

original: matsha ro ni gzhan dge la //
analyzed: matsha ro ni gzhan dge la //
translated: The Tsāro is the other virtue.

original: zhe sdang de bzhin ser sna gsum //
analyzed: zhe sdang de bzhin ser sna gsum //
translated: Hatred, likewise, the three miserlinesses.

original: bar lha yis spel ba dang // mchog gsum ma ni cung zad dga' //
analyzed: bar lha yis spel ba dang // mchog gsum ma ni cung zad dga' //
translated: The middle one is increased by the god, and the three supreme ones are a little joyful.

original: bam sh'am ku re smyug ma'i myug / mo min shing dbye bum pa'o //
analyzed: bam sh'am ku re smyug ma'i myug / mo min shing dbye bum pa'o //
translated: Bamśa is a bamboo shoot, kūra is a reed shoot, mo is not a tree, and vibhā is a pot.

analyzed: su barnne pi bh'u ri tsandroo dvoo dv'a ra ma tre pi go pu ram //

original: aa dzi ram ni yul dang dbus //
analyzed: aa dzi ram ni yul dang dbus //
translated: Ambaram, ākāśa, vāsaḥ.🔽Cakram, paracakram, rāṣṭram.🔽Akṣaraṃ, muktiḥ.🔽Kṣīram, apy, upaśucam.🔽Suvarṇaṃ, api, bhūri, candrasya, dvau.🔽Dvārā, gopuram.🔽Guha, adambha, gātram, gośca, dānam, nityam, vanaśca.🔽Ajiram, deśa, madhyam.

original: aamba ram ni nam mkha' gos //
analyzed: aamba ram ni nam mkha' gos //

original: tsakram pha rol dmag dang yul //
analyzed: tsakram pha rol dmag dang yul //

original: aaksha ra ni grol ba'o //
analyzed: aaksha ra ni grol ba'o //

original: ksh'i ra chu dang 'o ma la'o //
analyzed: ksh'i ra chu dang 'o ma la'o //
translated: Kṣīram, apy, upaśucam.🔽Suvarṇaṃ, api, bhūri, candrasya, dvau.

original: gser kyang bh'u ri tsandro gnyis //
analyzed: gser kyang bh'u ri tsandro gnyis //

original: sgo srung dang ni ba glang khyim //
analyzed: sgo srung dang ni ba glang khyim //
translated: Guha, adambha, gātram, gośca, dānam, nityam, vanaśca.🔽Ajiram, deśa, madhyam.🔽Ambaram, ākāśa, vāsaḥ.🔽Cakram, paracakram, rāṣṭram.

analyzed: phug dang nga rgyal hva re dve ra honti ka mu pa hva re //
translated: Akṣaraṃ, muktiḥ.🔽Kṣīram, apy, upaśucam.🔽Suvarṇaṃ, api, bhūri, candrasya, dvau.🔽Dvārā, gopuram.

original: pu ro& dhi ka mu par++ya gr'a nya g'a re na ga re pu ram //
analyzed: pu ro& dhi ka mu par++ya gr'a nya g'a re na ga re pu ram //

analyzed: mandi ram ts'a tha r'ashtre& stri bi sha ye sy'a du sa dra be //

original: da ro& stri y'am bha ye shva bhre badzro& str'i h'i ra ke pa boo //
analyzed: da ro& stri y'am bha ye shva bhre badzro& str'i h'i ra ke pa boo //

analyzed: tantram dh'a n+ya siddh'ante s'u tra b'a ye pa ga hva re //
translated: Tantra, Dhānya, Siddhanta, Sūtra, Vāyavya, Paghava, Re.

original: dben gnas au pa hva re'o //
analyzed: dben gnas au pa hva re'o //

original: sngon lhag steng mdun aa gr'a'o //
analyzed: sngon lhag steng mdun aa gr'a'o //
