original: khyim dang grong khyer pu ram ngo //🔽'du ba de nas yul 'khor ni //🔽mo min yul dang bar du gcod //
analyzed: khyim dang grong khyer pu ram ngo // 'du ba de nas yul 'khor ni // mo min yul dang bar du gcod //
translated: Gṛha, Nagara, Pura.🔽Saṃgha, Tatra, Rāṣṭra, Deśa.

original: da ro mo min 'jigs dang dong //
analyzed: da ro mo min 'jigs dang dong //
translated: Adāra, Deśa, Bhaya, Durgam.🔽Vajra, Deśa, Phala, Adhikam.

original: badzra mo min pha lam thog / tantram gtso bo grub mtha' dang // thag 'thags @231b ri tstsha da //
analyzed: badzra mo min pha lam thog / tantram gtso bo grub mtha' dang // thag 'thags @231b ri tstsha da //
translated: Tantra, Mukhya, Siddhānta, Sūtra, Vāyavya, Paghava, Re.

original: aoo sh'i ram ts'a ma ra dande pyoo sh'i ram sha ya n'a sa nam //🔽pushka ram ka ri hast'a gre b'a dya bh'anda mu khe dza le //
analyzed: aoo sh'i ram ts'a ma ra dande pyoo sh'i ram sha ya n'a sa nam // pushka ram ka ri hast'a gre b'a dya bh'anda mu khe dza le //
translated: Auśīraṃ, Camaram, Dandena, Pyośīraṃ, Śayanāsanam.🔽Puṣkaram, Karī, Hasti, Agraṃ, Vādya, Bhāṇḍa, Mukha, Jale.

original: byomni khadga pha le padme t'irtho sha dhi bi she sha yo: //
analyzed: byomni khadga pha le padme t'irtho sha dhi bi she sha yo: //
translated: Vyomni, Khaḍga, Phala, Padme, Tīrtha, Sodaśa, Dhīviśeṣaḥ.

original: aanta ra ma ba k'a sh'a ba dhi pa ri dh'a n'antardvi bhe da dang ni yongs 'gegs la'o //🔽rnga yab dbyug pa aoo sh'i ram //
analyzed: aanta ra ma ba k'a sh'a ba dhi pa ri dh'a n'antardvi bhe da dang ni yongs 'gegs la'o // rnga yab dbyug pa aoo sh'i ram //
translated: Antaram, a curtain; avabaddha, tied; paridhāna, a garment; antardvirepha, a bee; and parivāra, a retinue.

original: mal stan la yang aoo sh'i ram //
analyzed: mal stan la yang aoo sh'i ram //
translated: Cāmara, a yak-tail fan; daṇḍa, a staff; and oṣṭra, a camel.🔽Śayanāsanam, a bed and seat; and oṣṭra, a camel.

original: puska ram ni glang chen sna //🔽rnga dang snod kha chu dang ni //
analyzed: puska ram ni glang chen sna // rnga dang snod kha chu dang ni //
translated: Puṣkaram, an elephant’s trunk; and oṣṭra, a camel.🔽Bherī, a drum; bhāṇḍa, a vessel; and oṣṭra, a camel.

original: nam mkha' ral gri rtsed mo'i chas //🔽padma chu 'gram sman bye brag / aanta ram ni mthang dang ni //
analyzed: nam mkha' ral gri rtsed mo'i chas // padma chu 'gram sman bye brag / aanta ram ni mthang dang ni //
translated: Khaḍga, a sword; krīḍā, a toy; and oṣṭra, a camel.🔽Padma, a lotus; tīra, a bank; and oṣṭra, a camel.

original: sham thabs mtshams dang thibs po dang // t'a darthye //🔽tshi dr'atm'i ya bi n'a ba hi ra ba sha ra ma dhye& nta r'atma ni tsa //
analyzed: sham thabs mtshams dang thibs po dang // t'a darthye // tshi dr'atm'i ya bi n'a ba hi ra ba sha ra ma dhye& nta r'atma ni tsa //
translated: Antaram, an interval; and oṣṭra, a camel.🔽Antarat, within; and oṣṭra, a camel.

original: muste tsa pi tha ram r'a dza ka se ru nya pi n'a ga ram //
analyzed: muste tsa pi tha ram r'a dza ka se ru nya pi n'a ga ram //
translated: Musti, a fist; and oṣṭra, a camel.🔽Śarva, a deer; and oṣṭra, a camel.🔽Gaurī, a cow; and oṣṭra, a camel.

original: sh'arba ram tvandha ta ma sam gh'a tu ke bhe dya lingga kam / goo ro& ru ne si te p'i te bra na ....(shing ba la ta k'i) k'ar++ya pya ru ska ra //
analyzed: sh'arba ram tvandha ta ma sam gh'a tu ke bhe dya lingga kam / goo ro& ru ne si te p'i te bra na ....(shing ba la ta k'i) k'ar++ya pya ru ska ra //
translated: Rūpeṇa, with form; and oṣṭra, a camel.

original: dza tha dbye ba de don bu ga dang // bar gyim gtogs phyi gnas skabs //
analyzed: dza tha dbye ba de don bu ga dang // bar gyim gtogs phyi gnas skabs //
translated: and the external locations are the intervals.🔽The middle is the nature of the middle, and liga is the navel.

original: dbu ma bar gyi bdag nyid dang // li ga dur ....(gla sgang zer/) ni pi tha ram //
analyzed: dbu ma bar gyi bdag nyid dang // li ga dur ....(gla sgang zer/) ni pi tha ram //
translated: The shoulder is the shoulder, and the neck is the neck.🔽The hips are the hips, and the thighs are the thighs.

original: mon lug sga ni n'a ga ram //
analyzed: mon lug sga ni n'a ga ram //
translated: The calves are the calves, and the feet are the feet.

original: sh'a barba ram ni mun stug dang // 'joms byed dbye ba rtags med do //
analyzed: sh'a barba ram ni mun stug dang // 'joms byed dbye ba rtags med do //
translated: The divisions of the destroyer are the absence of signs.

original: goo ra dmar dang dkar dang ser //
analyzed: goo ra dmar dang dkar dang ser //
translated: The red, white, and yellow are the three goddesses.

original: aa ruska ra rma byed do //
analyzed: aa ruska ra rma byed do //
translated: The peacock is the peacock.

original: dza tha ra: ka thi ne pi sy'a da dha st'a da pi ts'a dha ra: //
analyzed: dza tha ra: ka thi ne pi sy'a da dha st'a da pi ts'a dha ra: //
translated: The ja and tha are the two, and the ka and thi are the two.🔽The anus and the mouth are the two, and the one is the nose.🔽The one is the eye, and the one is the ear.

original: aa n'a ku le pi tsee k'a gro bya gro by'a shakta a'aku le //
analyzed: aa n'a ku le pi tsee k'a gro bya gro by'a shakta a'aku le //
translated: The one is the tongue, and the one is the body.🔽The one is the mind, and the one is the supreme.🔽The one is the supreme, and the one is the supreme of the supreme.🔽The one is the supreme of the supreme, and the one is the supreme of the supreme of the supreme.🔽The one is the supreme of the supreme of the supreme of the supreme, and the one is the supreme of the supreme of the supreme of the supreme of the supreme.

analyzed: aa ba ya: shee la me sh'ark'a a'a dzny'a hv'a n'a dh'a r'a ha b'a: //
translated: The abode of the gods, Śaila, the sharp-rayed one, the sun, the supporter of the world.

original: bh'a ba: sa tva sva bh'a b'a bhi pr'a ya tsesht'atma dzanma pu //
analyzed: bh'a ba: sa tva sva bh'a b'a bhi pr'a ya tsesht'atma dzanma pu //
translated: Existence, sattva, self-nature, the intention to go.

original: sy'a dutp'a de pha le pushpe pra sa bo garbha mo tsa ne //
analyzed: sy'a dutp'a de pha le pushpe pra sa bo garbha mo tsa ne //
translated: Its arising, from a seed, from a flower, from a prasa, from a womb, from moisture.

original: aa bi shv'a se& pa hna be pi bdag po grogs mi dha b'a'o //
analyzed: aa bi shv'a se& pa hna be pi bdag po grogs mi dha b'a'o //
translated: Not manifest, and also born from an egg, from a womb, from heat and moisture.

original: aa bi ri bo lug nyi ma //
analyzed: aa bi ri bo lug nyi ma //
translated: The sun, the moon, the stars.

original: bka' bsgo 'bod dang mchod sbyin rnams //
analyzed: bka' bsgo 'bod dang mchod sbyin rnams //

original: a'a ha b'a 'o bh'a ba ni //
analyzed: a'a ha b'a 'o bh'a ba ni //

original: sems can rang bzhin dgongs pa dang // sems dang bdag skye rnams la'o //
analyzed: sems can rang bzhin dgongs pa dang // sems dang bdag skye rnams la'o //

original: la mtha'o // gnyis /
analyzed: la mtha'o // gnyis /
translated: The two, the end of the path and the end of the world.

original: bi shoo rje rigs mi dag go / gnyis /🔽bang chen mngon spyod pa shoo //
analyzed: bi shoo rje rigs mi dag go / gnyis / bang chen mngon spyod pa shoo //
translated: The two, the end of the family and the end of the caste.🔽The two, the end of the messenger and the end of the magical rite.

original: gnyis / r'a sh'i phung po lug sogs khyim //
analyzed: gnyis / r'a sh'i phung po lug sogs khyim //
translated: The two, the end of the heap and the end of the house of sheep and so forth.

original: bam shoo rigs dang 'od ma'o //
analyzed: bam shoo rigs dang 'od ma'o //
translated: The two, the end of the family and the end of the bamboo.

original: dben dang gsal ba b'i k'a sho //
analyzed: dben dang gsal ba b'i k'a sho //
translated: The two, the end of the solitary and the end of the clear.

original: sa dang ti ....(gla zer/) bho ga yoo: //🔽kri t'ante pum si k'i n'a sha: kshu dra karsha ka yo stri shu //
analyzed: sa dang ti ....(gla zer/) bho ga yoo: // kri t'ante pum si k'i n'a sha: kshu dra karsha ka yo stri shu //
translated: The two, the end of the earth and the end of the sky.🔽The two, the end of the created and the end of the body of the man.🔽The two, the end of the sun and the end of the moon.

original: pa de lakshme ni mette& pa de sha: sy'atku sha mapsu tsa //
analyzed: pa de lakshme ni mette& pa de sha: sy'atku sha mapsu tsa //
translated: The two, the end of the wealth and the end of the affection.🔽The two, the end of the wealth and the end of the virtue.

original: da sh'a basth'a ne ka bi dh'a py'a sha trishn'a pi ts'a ya t'a //🔽ba sh'astr'i ka ra n'i pa shy'a dri ka dzny'a ne dzny'a ta ri tri shu //
analyzed: da sh'a basth'a ne ka bi dh'a py'a sha trishn'a pi ts'a ya t'a // ba sh'astr'i ka ra n'i pa shy'a dri ka dzny'a ne dzny'a ta ri tri shu //
translated: The two, the end of the ten and the end of the various conditions.🔽The two, the end of the enemy and the end of the desire.🔽The two, the end of the weapon and the end of the arrow.

original: longs spyod rang be sho / mthar byed skyes bu k'i n'a sha / ser sna dang ni mkhregs pa gsum //🔽aa pa de sha gnas mtshan rtags //
analyzed: longs spyod rang be sho / mthar byed skyes bu k'i n'a sha / ser sna dang ni mkhregs pa gsum // aa pa de sha gnas mtshan rtags //
translated: The two, the end of the knowledge and the end of the three knowledges.

original: ku sha rtsva dang chu la yang //🔽da sha gnas skabs rnam mang po //
analyzed: ku sha rtsva dang chu la yang //🔽da sha gnas skabs rnam mang po //
translated: The two, the end of the sword and the end of the trident.

original: aa sha sred pa ring po'o //
analyzed: aa sha sred pa ring po'o //
translated: Aśa is craving, and Dīrgha is long.

original: ba sh'a glang mo dbang du byed //
analyzed: ba sh'a glang mo dbang du byed //
translated: Vaśā is a female elephant, and Vaśīkaraṇa is subjugation.

original: dri sha blo dang mig yin gsum //
analyzed: dri sha blo dang mig yin gsum //
translated: Triśa is intelligence and eye.

original: karka @234a * //
analyzed: karka @234a * //
translated: Karke is a crab.

original: sy'atkarka sa: ....(brtag dpyad med par kun la 'jug pa/) s'a ha si ka: ka tho r'a ma sri nab pi/....('jungs pa/) ....pra k'a sho& ti pra siddhe pi si sh'a ba dznye pi b'a li sha: //🔽su ra mat+sy'a ba ni mi shoo pu ru sh'a b'atma m'a na bo //

translated: Sāhasika is one who engages in everything without analysis.🔽Kāthara is miserly.

original: k'a ka mat+sy'a khe goo dhvam kshoo kakshoo tsa tri na b'i ru dhoo //
analyzed: k'a ka mat+sy'a khe goo dhvam kshoo kakshoo tsa tri na b'i ru dhoo //

original: aa bh'i shu pra gra he * //
analyzed: aa bh'i shu pra gra he * //
translated: Bāliśa is a fool.🔽Śūra is a hero.

original: sha ni dpa' rtul dang // sra ba dang ni gyong ba'o //
analyzed: sha ni dpa' rtul dang // sra ba dang ni gyong ba'o //

original: pra k'a sha ni rab gsal grags //
analyzed: pra k'a sha ni rab gsal grags //

original: byis dang blun po b'a li sha: //
analyzed: byis dang blun po b'a li sha: //

original: sha mtha'o // lha dang nya la ni mi sha //
analyzed: sha mtha'o // lha dang nya la ni mi sha //
translated: Sura is a god, and Matsya is a fish.

original: pu ru ba ni bdag dang me //
analyzed: pu ru ba ni bdag dang me //

original: dhv'am ksha bya rog nya mkha' 'gro //
analyzed: dhv'am ksha bya rog nya mkha' 'gro //
translated: Dhvāṃkṣa is a crow, and Matsya is a hawk.🔽Kṣo is a lion, and Kṣo is a jackal.🔽Cāṭa is a trickster.🔽Vṛddha is old.

original: kaksho rtsa dang 'khri shing ngo //
analyzed: kaksho rtsa dang 'khri shing ngo //

analyzed: ko shonyastr'i kutma le ....(padma'i nang/) khadga pi dh'a ne& rthoo gha di bya yo: //

analyzed: hum tarke sy'a du du sh'a r'a tre ra ba s'a ne na mon too //

analyzed: pu na rarthe& nggam nind'a y'am dushthu sashthu pra shansa ne //

original: aa dy'a tr'a hn+ya tha dang mnyes gshin tshig / hum ni rtog ge au sha ni //🔽nam gyi cha smad phyag dang 'dud //🔽bod pa yang don aam ga'o //🔽smod dang ngan smra bstod shis tshig / dgongs mo nyi ma nam langs snga //🔽sa gcig pa dang kanti ke / na ning bzhi ni da lo deng //🔽son ma dang ni ches sngon ma //🔽'dir ni de ring nyi ma'o //
analyzed: aa dy'a tr'a hn+ya tha dang mnyes gshin tshig / hum ni rtog ge au sha ni // nam gyi cha smad phyag dang 'dud // bod pa yang don aam ga'o // smod dang ngan smra bstod shis tshig / dgongs mo nyi ma nam langs snga // sa gcig pa dang kanti ke / na ning bzhi ni da lo deng // son ma dang ni ches sngon ma // 'dir ni de ring nyi ma'o //
translated: The words today and tomorrow are used in the sense of dear.🔽 Hum is conjecture, and uśa is dawn.🔽 The words evening and bowing are used in the sense of salutation.🔽 The word yes is used in the sense of meaning.🔽 The words blame, reproach, praise, and blessing are used in the sense of evening.🔽 The words last night, four years ago, and now are used in the sense of morning.🔽 The words before and very much before are used in the sense of sunrise.🔽 The words here and today are used in the sense of sun.🔽 The words there and tomorrow are used in the sense of moon.🔽 The words now and today are used in the sense of star.🔽 The words yesterday and today are used in the sense of planet.🔽 The words now and today are used in the sense of day.🔽 The words last night and today are used in the sense of night.🔽 The words now and today are used in the sense of month.🔽 The words last year and today are used in the sense of year.🔽 The words now and today are used in the sense of season.🔽 The words last year and today are used in the sense of fortnight.🔽 The words now and today are used in the sense of half-month.🔽 The words last year and today are used in the sense of month.🔽 The words now and today are used in the sense of year.🔽 The words last year and today are used in the sense of season.🔽 The words last year and today are used in the sense of fortnight.🔽 The words now and today are used in the sense of half-month.🔽

original: sngon ma phyi ma gzhan dang ni //
analyzed: sngon ma phyi ma gzhan dang ni //
translated: The former and the latter are different.

original: de bzhin du ni gzhan dang gzhan //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni gzhan dang gzhan //
translated: And likewise, one after another,

original: sngon ma'i nyi ma la sogs pa //
analyzed: sngon ma'i nyi ma la sogs pa //
translated: The former day and so on,

original: nyi ma gnyis pa gnangs nyin mo //
analyzed: nyi ma gnyis pa gnangs nyin mo //
translated: The second day is the day after tomorrow.

original: phyi dro'i thun ni pa re dya //
analyzed: phyi dro'i thun ni pa re dya //
translated: The afternoon is the day after.

original: kha rtsang 'das pa ma 'ongs pa //
analyzed: kha rtsang 'das pa ma 'ongs pa //
translated: Yesterday is the past, tomorrow is the future,

original: nyi thun dang ni gnangs nang par //
analyzed: nyi thun dang ni gnangs nang par //
translated: The morning is the day before yesterday, the day after tomorrow is the day after.

original: phyi thun de thun de yi tshe ka d'a sarba d'a sa d'a //
analyzed: phyi thun de thun de yi tshe ka d'a sarba d'a sa d'a //
translated: The evening is the time of that, the time of that.

original: ae tarhi sam pra t'i d'a n'i ma dhu n'a sam pra dam ta th'a //
analyzed: ae tarhi sam pra t'i d'a n'i ma dhu n'a sam pra dam ta th'a //
translated: Now is the present, not the past or future.

original: digde sha k'a le p'u rbb'a doo pr'a gu dakpra tya g'a da ya: //🔽aa bya ya bargga:/🔽// / sa lingga sh'a stree sann'a di kritta ddhi ta sa m'a sa dze: //🔽aa dus kun du dang rtag tu dang // da lta dang ni da ltar dang // da dang da lta de bzhin du //
analyzed: digde sha k'a le p'u rbb'a doo pr'a gu dakpra tya g'a da ya: // aa bya ya bargga:/ // / sa lingga sh'a stree sann'a di kritta ddhi ta sa m'a sa dze: // aa dus kun du dang rtag tu dang // da lta dang ni da ltar dang // da dang da lta de bzhin du //
translated: The direction is the east and so on, the place is the village and so on,

original: khyogs dang yul dang dus yin no //
analyzed: khyogs dang yul dang dus yin no //
translated: The time is the moment and so on.

original: shar la sogs pa sngon ma dang // phyi ma dang ni gzhan la sogs //
analyzed: shar la sogs pa sngon ma dang // phyi ma dang ni gzhan la sogs //
translated: The body is the trunk and so on, the limbs are the hands and so on,🔽The senses are the eyes and so on, the objects are the forms and so on.

original: mi zad pa'i sde tshan no /
analyzed: mi zad pa'i sde tshan no /
translated: The inexhaustible class.

original: // / rtags kyi bstan bcos dang bcas san sogs dang // kri ta dang de phan tshig sdug las skyes pa //
analyzed: // / rtags kyi bstan bcos dang bcas san sogs dang // kri ta dang de phan tshig sdug las skyes pa //
translated: The treatise on grammar, etc., and the Kṛta, and that which is born from the contraction of the beneficial words,

original: ma bshad @239a * //
analyzed: ma bshad @239a * //
translated: are not explained.

original: nukte: sam gra ho linggam sam k'irnna ba di honna yeta //
analyzed: nukte: sam gra ho linggam sam k'irnna ba di honna yeta //
translated: The Saṃgraha, the Olinga, the Saṃkīrṇa, and the Vada are the names of the Saṃskṛta language.

original: lingga she sha bi dhi by'a p'i bi she shee r++ya dya b'a dhi ta: //🔽stri y'a m'i d'u dbi r'a mee k'a tssa yo ni pr'a ni n'a ma tsa //
analyzed: lingga she sha bi dhi by'a p'i bi she shee r++ya dya b'a dhi ta: // stri y'a m'i d'u dbi r'a mee k'a tssa yo ni pr'a ni n'a ma tsa //
translated: The Liṅga, the Śeṣa, the Vidyā, the Pāyī, the Viśeṣa, the Ādhyāya, and the Vādhita are the names of the divisions.

original: n'a ma bi d+yu nni sh'a * //
analyzed: n'a ma bi d+yu nni sh'a * //
translated: The Stṛ, the Y, the Ī, the D, the V, the R, the Ā, the Me, the E, the Ai, the O, the Au, the Aṃ, and the Aḥ are the vowels.

original: rnams kyis yang dag bsdus so rtags //
analyzed: rnams kyis yang dag bsdus so rtags //
translated: The Ka, the Ca, the Ṭa, the Ṭa, the Ta, the Tha, the Da, the Dha, the Pa, the Pha, the Ba, the Bha, the Ya, the Ra, the La, the Va, the Śa, the Ṣa, the Sa, and the Ha are the consonants.

original: spe lam 'dra bar 'dir ni rtogs par bya //🔽gal te khyad par rnams kyis ma bkag na //🔽rtags kyi lhag ma'i cho ga khyab byed yin //🔽bud med a'i dang a'u dang ni //🔽ngal bso dbyangs gcig las med dang // skye gnas ldan pa'i srog chags ming //
analyzed: spe lam 'dra bar 'dir ni rtogs par bya // gal te khyad par rnams kyis ma bkag na // rtags kyi lhag ma'i cho ga khyab byed yin // bud med a'i dang a'u dang ni // ngal bso dbyangs gcig las med dang // skye gnas ldan pa'i srog chags ming //
translated: The names of the planets are Bṛhaspati, Budha, Guru, Śukra, Śani, Rāhu, and Ketu.

original: ming dang glog dang ball'i b'a n'i di gbh'u na di dha y'am //
analyzed: ming dang glog dang ball'i b'a n'i di gbh'u na di dha y'am //
translated: The names of the stars are Aśvinī, Bharaṇī, Kṛttikā, Rohiṇī, Mṛgaśirā, Ārdrā, Punarvasu, Puṣya, Āśleṣā, Maghā, Pūrvāphālgunī, Uttarāphālgunī, Hasta, Citrā, Svātī, Viśākhā, Anurādhā, Jyeṣṭhā, Mūla, Pūrvāṣāḍhā, Uttarāṣāḍhā, Śravaṇa, Dhaniṣṭhā, Śatabhiṣā, Pūrvāproṣṭhapadā, Uttarāproṣṭhapadā, Revatī, Aśvayuj, Bharaṇī, and Kṛttikā.

original: aa nantee rdvi gu re k'artho na sa p'a tra yu g'a di bhi: //
analyzed: aa nantee rdvi gu re k'artho na sa p'a tra yu g'a di bhi: //
translated: Anante, dve, gura, eka, artha, onasa, patra, yuga, adibhiḥ.

original: ta la prinde ye ni ka dya tra bee r'a mee thu ni k'a di bun //🔽str'i bh'a b'a d'a ba ni: kti na nvu la tskya po yu dza di nyni mtshan mo dang // 'khril shing mda' dang phyogs dang sa //
analyzed: ta la prinde ye ni ka dya tra bee r'a mee thu ni k'a di bun // str'i bh'a b'a d'a ba ni: kti na nvu la tskya po yu dza di nyni mtshan mo dang // 'khril shing mda' dang phyogs dang sa //
translated: Ta, la, pinda, ye, nika, dya, atra, vairāme, thuna, ikā, adibhiḥ.🔽Strī, bhāva, āvaniḥ, kati, nanv, ula, cya, po, yuj, adibhiḥ.

original: gtsang po blo gros rnams ni mo //
analyzed: gtsang po blo gros rnams ni mo //
translated: Night, embrace, arrow, direction, and river are the feminine.

original: aad mtha' ba gnyis don gcig pa //
analyzed: aad mtha' ba gnyis don gcig pa //
translated: Ananta, two, teacher, one, meaning, on the bank, vessel, pair, etc.

original: snod dang dus sogs ma gtogs pa //
analyzed: snod dang dus sogs ma gtogs pa //
translated: Except for the vessel, time, etc.

original: tal 'tshogs pa ya dang ai ni kadya tra //
analyzed: tal 'tshogs pa ya dang ai ni kadya tra //
translated: Ta, la, pinda, ya, and ika, dya, atra.

original: dgra dang 'khrig pa sogs la bu na'o //
analyzed: dgra dang 'khrig pa sogs la bu na'o //
translated: Enemy, copulation, etc., are denoted by bu.

original: bud med dngos po sogs la aa niktin //
analyzed: bud med dngos po sogs la aa niktin //
translated: The state of a woman, etc., by aniktin.

original: nvu la aa tsa kyas aa yu tsa aang ai sh'a //
analyzed: nvu la aa tsa kyas aa yu tsa aang ai sh'a //
translated: Nanv, ula, cya, po, yuj, adibhiḥ.

original: au n'a di shu ni r'u r'i shtsa ng+y'a b'u dantam tsa lam sthi ram //
analyzed: au n'a di shu ni r'u r'i shtsa ng+y'a b'u dantam tsa lam sthi ram //
translated: The northern direction, the moon, the elephant, the immovable, etc.

original: tatkr'i d'a y'am pra ha ra nam tsetmoo sht'a p'alla b'a na di gra / gha nyo nya: s'a kri y'a: sy'a nytse dd'a nda p'a t'a di ph'algu n'i //
analyzed: tatkr'i d'a y'am pra ha ra nam tsetmoo sht'a p'alla b'a na di gra / gha nyo nya: s'a kri y'a: sy'a nytse dd'a nda p'a t'a di ph'algu n'i //
translated: The ghaṇāḥ and the sakṛt are the sāyaccetana and the pātāḍiphalguni.

original: syee nam p'a t'a tsa mri ga pa tee lam p'a ta sva dhe ti nya ni sh'a //🔽a'u na sogs rnams la ni dang a'u dang a'i //
analyzed: syee nam p'a t'a tsa mri ga pa tee lam p'a ta sva dhe ti nya ni sh'a // a'u na sogs rnams la ni dang a'u dang a'i //
translated: The śyenapātā and the cāmarapatitā are the svadhā and the nīṣaḥ.🔽The ūna and so forth are the na and the ū.

original: d'i a'as a'ud mtha' g-yo dang brtan pa la //
analyzed: d'i a'as a'ud mtha' g-yo dang brtan pa la //
translated: The dī and the ā are the āḍha and the ūḍha.🔽The anta and the gāḍha are the gāḍha and the gāḍha.

original: gal te rtse ba'i mtshon cha de yin na //
analyzed: gal te rtse ba'i mtshon cha de yin na //
translated: If that is the weapon of play,

original: khu tshur thal lcag na ni mo yi rkyen //
analyzed: khu tshur thal lcag na ni mo yi rkyen //
translated: the fist and the palm are the conditions of the woman.

original: gha nya las nya de gal te 'di'i bya ba //
analyzed: gha nya las nya de gal te 'di'i bya ba //
translated: If the ghaṇāḥ and the nya are the action of this,🔽the punishment, falling, and so forth, are the rivals.🔽The hawk, falling, and the deer,🔽the clarified butter, the birth, the demon,

original: chad pa ltung ba la sogs sbo zla dang // khra dang ltung ba dang ni ri dags dang // mar khu 'khrungs pa bdud @239b dig / str'i sy'a tk'a tsi tmri n'a ly'a di bi baksh'a nya pa tsa ye ya di //
analyzed: chad pa ltung ba la sogs sbo zla dang // khra dang ltung ba dang ni ri dags dang // mar khu 'khrungs pa bdud @239b dig / str'i sy'a tk'a tsi tmri n'a ly'a di bi baksh'a nya pa tsa ye ya di //
translated: the woman, and the mind, the various,🔽the desire, and the desire.

original: lam k'a she ph'a li k'a t'i k'a ....(rgyas 'grel/) dh'a ta k'i ....(skyu ru ra dang ma ma/) panyadzi k'a ....(dka' 'grel/) &amp ;
analyzed: lam k'a she ph'a li k'a t'i k'a ....(rgyas 'grel/) dh'a ta k'i ....(skyu ru ra dang ma ma/) panyadzi k'a ....(dka' 'grel/) &amp ;
translated: Pañjikā🔽Ṭīkā🔽Siddhāṅka🔽Śārikāhikakapratīkā

original: ta ....(bre bo/) k'i / si dhra k'a sh'a ....(sman gyi bye brag/) sh'a rikk'a hikk'a pra ....(sngon byung ba/) tsi kolko ....(aulka 'bar ba'am skar mda' 'am sgron me ta la la) pi p'i li k'a /
analyzed: ta ....(bre bo/) k'i / si dhra k'a sh'a ....(sman gyi bye brag/) sh'a rikk'a hikk'a pra ....(sngon byung ba/) tsi kolko ....(aulka 'bar ba'am skar mda' 'am sgron me ta la la) pi p'i li k'a /
translated: Cikolkā

original: rtsi mo yin no //
analyzed: rtsi mo yin no //
translated: pippalī

original: gal te mgrin pa brjod 'dod yin pa na //
analyzed: gal te mgrin pa brjod 'dod yin pa na //
translated: If the throat is the desire to speak,

original: pad rtsal sogs 'ga' zhig bud med 'gyur //
analyzed: pad rtsal sogs 'ga' zhig bud med 'gyur //
translated: some, such as the lotus stalk, become women.🔽laṅkāśe🔽phali kāṭī🔽kāṭī🔽pañjikā

original: (lo ma) ....lam k'a she ....(shing gi rtsa ba'i phreng ba/) pha li k'a t'i k'adh'a ta k'i / panydzi k'a dang lam ka aa ta k'i //
analyzed: (lo ma) ....lam k'a she ....(shing gi rtsa ba'i phreng ba/) pha li k'a t'i k'adh'a ta k'i / panydzi k'a dang lam ka aa ta k'i //
translated: laṅkāṭaṭī

original: si dhra'i shing dang smra byed bye'u dang // skyigs bu sbrang rtsi 'bar ba grog ma dang / tindu k'i ....(chung ngu/) ka ni k'a bha ....(sman shing/) gi su ....(sa'i 'og tu brkos te 'jul ba/) rungg'a s'u ....(khab/) tsi m'a tra ya:/....(sman gyi bye brag/) (mjug sgro/) ..../ pitstsh'a bi ....(sman gyi) bye brag /
analyzed: si dhra'i shing dang smra byed bye'u dang // skyigs bu sbrang rtsi 'bar ba grog ma dang / tindu k'i ....(chung ngu/) ka ni k'a bha ....(sman shing/) gi su ....(sa'i 'og tu brkos te 'jul ba/) rungg'a s'u ....(khab/) tsi m'a tra ya:/....(sman gyi bye brag/) (mjug sgro/) ..../ pitstsh'a bi ....(sman gyi) bye brag /
translated: The Cimatras, the Vaitarana, the Pitschvi,

original: tand'a k'a ki nya shts'u rnni s'a n'i ....(bdar rdo/) dru ni ....(sman/) da ....(sman) da rata //
analyzed: tand'a k'a ki nya shts'u rnni s'a n'i ....(bdar rdo/) dru ni ....(sman/) da ....(sman) da rata //
translated: The Tandaka, the Kaka, the Nyacha, the Churnini, the Sana, the Dru, the Da, the Dar,

original: s'a ti: kanth'a ta th'a nya san d'i n'a bh'i r'a dza sa bh'a pi tsa //
analyzed: s'a ti: kanth'a ta th'a nya san d'i n'a bh'i r'a dza sa bh'a pi tsa //
translated: The Sati, the Kantha, the Tatha, the Sande, the Nava, the Raja, the Sabha, the Piti,🔽The Jhallari, the Carva, the Riri, the Pari, the Hora, the Ardhaha,

original: (lcags kyi sil khrol/) ....dzhlla r'i tsarbb'a ....(rdza rnga kha gcig pa/) r'i p'a r'i ho r'a ....dus sbyor phyed /🔽latb'a si dhma l'a //
analyzed: (lcags kyi sil khrol/) ....dzhlla r'i tsarbb'a ....(rdza rnga kha gcig pa/) r'i p'a r'i ho r'a ....dus sbyor phyed / latb'a si dhma l'a //
translated: The Lata, the Vasi, the Dhama, the Lata,

original: l'a kshya liksh'a tsa tindu ka'i shing zham mo bcom tshos legs //
analyzed: l'a kshya liksh'a tsa tindu ka'i shing zham mo bcom tshos legs //
translated: The Lakshya, the Likcha, the Tinduka, the tree, the small, the destroyed, the cooked, the good.

original: phra ma dang ni ma dang lo ma dang / 'bras bu rgol ba phub dang ni //
analyzed: phra ma dang ni ma dang lo ma dang / 'bras bu rgol ba phub dang ni //
translated: Slander, mother, leaf, fruit, dispute, chaff,

original: phye ma dang ni sha na'i gos //
analyzed: phye ma dang ni sha na'i gos //
translated: flour, and cloth of China.

original: shin tu dga' dang bem dug dang // de bzhin stan lte rgyal po'i 'khor //
analyzed: shin tu dga' dang bem dug dang // de bzhin stan lte rgyal po'i 'khor //
translated: Very much delight, poison, and likewise seat, foot, king, retinue,

original: 'khar ba ri mo dus sbyor dang // nya rul tshos dang sro ma'i gam ....(lag tu chu hub gcig/) du sh'a gri dha sh'i tsa ma s'i ma s'i //
analyzed: 'khar ba ri mo dus sbyor dang // nya rul tshos dang sro ma'i gam ....(lag tu chu hub gcig/) du sh'a gri dha sh'i tsa ma s'i ma s'i //
translated: staff, picture, conjunction, and near a rotten fish.

original: pum stve sa bhe d'a nu tsa r'a: sa par++y'a y'a: su r'a su r'a: //
analyzed: pum stve sa bhe d'a nu tsa r'a: sa par++y'a y'a: su r'a su r'a: //
translated: The people of the world, with their various desires, are like the various rivers.

original: svargga y'a g'a dri me gh'a bdhi dru k'a l'a pi sha r'a ra ya: //
analyzed: svargga y'a g'a dri me gh'a bdhi dru k'a l'a pi sha r'a ra ya: //
translated: The various heavens, with their clouds, lightning, and thunder, are like the various mountains.

original: ka ra ganda shthoo do rdanta kantha ke sha na kha sta n'a: //🔽aa hn'a h'a nt'a: khrus //
analyzed: ka ra ganda shthoo do rdanta kantha ke sha na kha sta n'a: // aa hn'a h'a nt'a: khrus //
translated: The various gods, with their arms, eyes, faces, and hair, are like the various trees.🔽The various winds, with their inhalations and exhalations, are like the various birds.

original: chang snod snag tsha gri dha s'i //🔽skyes bu nyid la lha dang lha min rnams //
analyzed: chang snod snag tsha gri dha s'i // skyes bu nyid la lha dang lha min rnams //
translated: The various pots, with their ink, are like the various fruits.

analyzed: lyu: ka rtta r'i ma nidzbh'a be ko gho: ki: pr'a di to& n+ya ta: //

analyzed: dvendve &amp ; shva ba da b'a ba gal te aa ta mtha' yin de nas //

analyzed: ko ty'a: sha t'a di sam khya& n+y'a b'a la ksha ni yu tanytsa tata //

analyzed: tr'antam sa lo pa dham shi shtam ra tram pr'a ka sam khy'a y'a &amp ;

analyzed: gzhan yang 'bum dang sa ya dang // aa tsa gnyis pa aas ai aus aan mtha' //

analyzed: tra mtha' sa la nye sngon lhag ma dang // thog mar grangs dang ldan @241a * //

analyzed: sha shthy'a shtsh'a y'a ba hu n'am tse dvi tstsh'a yam sam ha to sa bh'a //

analyzed: sh'a l'arth'a pi pa r'a r'a dza ma nu shy'a rth'a da r'a dza * //

analyzed: pa'i r'a tra dang // snod la sogs pa aa ta mtha' rnams kyi don //

analyzed: gcig pa'i ba gnyis mtshon bya'i rjes 'brang nas //

analyzed: zlas dbye'i gcig nyid mi zad gyur pa dag / mi zad grangs las pha rol pa tha'o //

analyzed: gal te ming ni drug pa las tsh'a ya //

analyzed: tshogs pa dang ni 'dus pa'i bitstshva ya //

analyzed: khang don pha rol mi ma yin gyi don //

analyzed: bh'a bhe na na ke tsidbhyo &amp ;

analyzed: nye bar shes dang nye bar bgrod pa'i mtha' //

analyzed: // / punna punsa ka yo: she sho &amp ;

original: drug pa'i mtha' yi tshig rnams snga ma can //
analyzed: drug pa'i mtha' yi tshig rnams snga ma can //
translated: The words ending in the sixth case are preceded by the first case.

original: dmag dang grib ma ra ba chang mtshan mo //
analyzed: dmag dang grib ma ra ba chang mtshan mo //

analyzed: yang na'o dmag gi mi dang sang dgongs dang // ba lang rab gzhan la'ang phyogs yin no //

analyzed: aa ba aan mtha' can tshig pa do dvi gushts'a pum si na shtsa lu pa //

analyzed: diktri kha tv'am tri kha tv'i tsa tri taksha pi m'a na s'ata /
translated: The third case is dik, tri, khaṭvā, trikhaṭvā, tridaṇḍa, and pi.🔽The fourth case is śūpātra, pūpātra, kuvalaya, dadhi,

original: // / tri shu p'a tr'i pu ta ....('khar snod/) b'a t'i pe t'i ku ba la d'a di moo //🔽pa ra lingga sva pra dh'a ne dva dve tatpu ru she pi ta ta //

analyzed: aartha nt'a: pr'a dya lam pr'a pt'a panna rnams phyi ma can //

original: ba gnyis pa dang skyes min na yang dbyi //
analyzed: ba gnyis pa dang skyes min na yang dbyi //

original: phyogs dang khri gsum khri gsum gsum 'jog kyang /
analyzed: phyogs dang khri gsum khri gsum gsum 'jog kyang /
translated: The seventh case is dik, tri, khaṭvā, trikhaṭvā, tridaṇḍa, and pi.🔽The eighth case is śūpātra, pūpātra, kuvalaya, dadhi,🔽moca, parīlī, svapradhāne, dvāvetattpuruṣe, and pitta.🔽The ninth case is arthāntāḥ, prādyalam, prāptā, and apan.

original: // / gsum rnams snod dang phur ma dang ni khur //
analyzed: // / gsum rnams snod dang phur ma dang ni khur //

original: sgrom dang autpal dang se 'bru'o //
analyzed: sgrom dang autpal dang se 'bru'o //
translated: The box, the lotus, and the pomegranate.

analyzed: pha rol rtags ni rang gtso zlas dbye dang // de yi skyes bu yang de don gyi mtha' //

analyzed: tiddhi t'arthe dvi gu: sam khy'a sarba n'a ma ta danta k'a: //
translated: The two, the tithi and the artha, the samkhya, all the names, and that, the end.

original: ba hu br'i hi ra dingn'a mna munne yam ta du d'a hri tam //
analyzed: ba hu br'i hi ra dingn'a mna munne yam ta du d'a hri tam //
translated: The bahuvrihi, the heridana, the aman, the munayana, and that, the duad, the triad, and the hrīta.

original: yon tan rdzas dang bya ba la sbyor ba'i //
analyzed: yon tan rdzas dang bya ba la sbyor ba'i //
translated: Those that are preceded by a quality are added to a substance or an action.

original: sngon ma can rnams pha rol 'gro ba can //
analyzed: sngon ma can rnams pha rol 'gro ba can //
translated: Those that have a prefix are added to a noun.

original: ming med byed pa po la kri ta rnams te //
analyzed: ming med byed pa po la kri ta rnams te //
translated: The kṛts are added to an agent without a prefix.

original: las dang byed pa po la karmma ni //🔽aa n'a dyant'a sta na rakt'a dya rthe n'a n'a rtha bhe de k'a: //🔽sha ta sam dznya k'ashti shu sa m'a yushma dasma tti nga bya yam //🔽pa nam bi ro dhe se shantu dznye yam shi shta pra yo ga ta: //🔽lingga sam gra ha bargga:/🔽// / padma kri tya rnams //
analyzed: las dang byed pa po la karmma ni // aa n'a dyant'a sta na rakt'a dya rthe n'a n'a rtha bhe de k'a: // sha ta sam dznya k'ashti shu sa m'a yushma dasma tti nga bya yam // pa nam bi ro dhe se shantu dznye yam shi shta pra yo ga ta: // lingga sam gra ha bargga:/ // / padma kri tya rnams //
translated: The karmans are added to an action or an agent.

original: des bcos la sogs don la aan sogs mtha' //
analyzed: des bcos la sogs don la aan sogs mtha' //
translated: The anadyantas are added to a word meaning “end” and so on.

original: sna tshogs don gyi dbye ba can rnams so //
analyzed: sna tshogs don gyi dbye ba can rnams so //
translated: The ṇas are added to a word meaning “various” and so on.🔽The śatas are added to a word meaning “hundred” and so on.🔽The saṃjñas are added to a word meaning “six” and so on.

original: drug gi ming can rnams ni gsum dang mnyam //
analyzed: drug gi ming can rnams ni gsum dang mnyam //
translated: The kṣats are added to a word meaning “three” and so on.

original: yushma da aa smad ting dang mi zad pa //
analyzed: yushma da aa smad ting dang mi zad pa //
translated: The ayus are added to a word meaning “life” and so on.🔽The daśmas are added to a word meaning “ten” and so on.🔽The paṇas are added to a word meaning “coin” and so on.

original: 'gal ba la ni phyi ma'o lhag ma rnams //
analyzed: 'gal ba la ni phyi ma'o lhag ma rnams //
translated: The virodhas are added to a word meaning “contradiction” and so on.

original: mchog gi sbyor ba las ni shes par bya //
analyzed: mchog gi sbyor ba las ni shes par bya //
translated: The śiṣṭas are added to a word meaning “superior” and so on.🔽The prayogas are added to a word meaning “application” and so on.🔽The liṅgas are added to a word meaning “mark” and so on.

original: rtags bsdus pa'i sde tshan no /
analyzed: rtags bsdus pa'i sde tshan no /
translated: The saṃgrahas are added to a word meaning “collection” and so on.

original: // / padma rnams ni ni bo dha ya tyarkka: k'a by'a ni ku ru te ka bi //🔽tat+soo ra bhanna bha svanta: santa stanbanti tanggu n'a na: //🔽sa m'apta mi da ma ma ra sim ha kri tann'a ma lam ngg'a nu sh'a sa nam /🔽// / buddh'a pu ny'a nu bh'a be na de ba t'a n'am ma te ba tsa //
analyzed: // / padma rnams ni ni bo dha ya tyarkka: k'a by'a ni ku ru te ka bi // tat+soo ra bhanna bha svanta: santa stanbanti tanggu n'a na: // sa m'apta mi da ma ma ra sim ha kri tann'a ma lam ngg'a nu sh'a sa nam / // / buddh'a pu ny'a nu bh'a be na de ba t'a n'am ma te ba tsa //
translated: The lotuses, with the words Be enlightened! and the clouds with the words Be rain-giving!🔽 The sun, with the words Be light-giving! and the moon, with the words Be cool!🔽 Having attained the state of a lion-like man, named Damarama, through the grace of the guru,🔽🔽By the power of the Buddha's merits, the gods, with their minds,🔽🔽

original: yo yo& rtha: sa ma bhi pr'a nyi mas rgyas //🔽snyan ngag rnams ni mkhas ba yis //🔽de yi dri bzang rlung gis 'ded //
analyzed: yo yo& rtha: sa ma bhi pr'a nyi mas rgyas // snyan ngag rnams ni mkhas ba yis // de yi dri bzang rlung gis 'ded //
translated: The lotuses are opened by the sun, the clouds by the wind.

original: de bzhin mkhas pas de yon tan /
analyzed: de bzhin mkhas pas de yon tan /
translated: The good qualities of the wise are proclaimed by their very enemies.

original: // 'chi med sengges byas pa'i ming dang rtags rjes su bstan pa 'di rdzogs so /
analyzed: // 'chi med sengges byas pa'i ming dang rtags rjes su bstan pa 'di rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the teaching of the name and the signs composed by the immortal Siṃha.

original: // / sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang // lha rnams kyis ni bsam pa yis //
analyzed: // / sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang // lha rnams kyis ni bsam pa yis //
translated: By the power of the Buddha's merit and the wish of the gods,

original: khyed kyi 'dod don gang yin @243a * //🔽ta: sarbo nya rtho nya dya sa mri dhya t'ama //
analyzed: khyed kyi 'dod don gang yin @243a * //🔽ta: sarbo nya rtho nya dya sa mri dhya t'ama //
translated: whatever you desire,🔽all your aims will be accomplished.

original: n'a n'a ka b'i n'am ya di n'a ma ko sh'a: sam tye ba k'a by'a rth'a be dam pra bandh'a //
analyzed: n'a n'a ka b'i n'am ya di n'a ma ko sh'a: sam tye ba k'a by'a rth'a be dam pra bandh'a //
translated: The treasury of names of various poems,

original: ta th'a bi s'ukte nya ma ra sam ha n'amna: ka be ra t'i ba pra sri tam ma no na:/🔽// / ye dharmma he tu pra bha b'a he tunte sh'anta th'a ga to * //🔽pa'i // don de de ring grub gyur cig / sna tshogs snyan ngag rnams kyi ming gi mdzod //🔽snyan ngag don rig rnams kyis rab sbyar ba //
analyzed: ta th'a bi s'ukte nya ma ra sam ha n'amna: ka be ra t'i ba pra sri tam ma no na:/ // / ye dharmma he tu pra bha b'a he tunte sh'anta th'a ga to * // pa'i // don de de ring grub gyur cig / sna tshogs snyan ngag rnams kyi ming gi mdzod // snyan ngag don rig rnams kyis rab sbyar ba //
translated: which the lion of poets, the great Śramana,

original: de ltar 'chi med seng ges legs par bshad //
analyzed: de ltar 'chi med seng ges legs par bshad //
translated: has well explained,

original: snyan ngag pa rnams yid la dga' ba spel //
analyzed: snyan ngag pa rnams yid la dga' ba spel //
translated: increases the delight of the minds of poets.🔽Those who know the meaning of poetry, may they be successful in their aim today!

original: gang rnams chos rnams rgyu las byung ba dang // de yi rgyu dang de 'gog hya ba data //🔽te sh'a nytsa yo ni ro dh'a ae bam b'a d'i ma h'a shra ma na:/
analyzed: gang rnams chos rnams rgyu las byung ba dang // de yi rgyu dang de 'gog hya ba data // te sh'a nytsa yo ni ro dh'a ae bam b'a d'i ma h'a shra ma na:/
translated: All things arise from causes, and those causes and their cessation🔽have been taught by the Great Ascetic.

original: // / pandi ta chen po k'irtti tsandra'i zhal snga nas /
analyzed: // / pandi ta chen po k'irtti tsandra'i zhal snga nas /
translated: By the great pandit Kīrticandra.

original: yar lung pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bal yul yam bu'i grong khyer du bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: yar lung pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bal yul yam bu'i grong khyer du bsgyur ba'o //
translated: by the one from Yarlung, Drakpa Gyaltsen, in the city of Yumbu in Nepal.

original: gang yin pa //
analyzed: gang yin pa //
translated: What is it?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te //
translated: It was spoken by the Tathagata himself.

original: de skad gsung ba'i tshul can dge sbyong che /
analyzed: de skad gsung ba'i tshul can dge sbyong che /
translated: The great ascetic who speaks in this way

original: // / shu bham ma stus rba dza ga t'am /
analyzed: // / shu bham ma stus rba dza ga t'am /
translated: shrimat sudharmā pravadan jagadguroḥ

original: slad nas 'gos lotstsha ba dge slong shr'i dharma p'a la bha dra zhes bgyi bas /
analyzed: slad nas 'gos lotstsha ba dge slong shr'i dharma p'a la bha dra zhes bgyi bas /
translated: Later, the translator from Go, the monk Shri Dharmapala Bhadra,

original: rgya dpe dang 'gyur rnying la gtugs te /
analyzed: rgya dpe dang 'gyur rnying la gtugs te /
translated: compared it with the Indian text and old translations,

original: don la ci nus dpyad de 'gyur ba de bar bgyis pa'o //🔽sna tshogs dngos po rnams kyi mngon brjod pa //
analyzed: don la ci nus dpyad de 'gyur ba de bar bgyis pa'o // sna tshogs dngos po rnams kyi mngon brjod pa //
translated: and made the translation as correct as possible, having examined the meaning to the best of his ability.🔽This treatise, which is an abhidhana of various things,

original: rin chen 'byung gnas la 'gran bstan bcos 'di //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung gnas la 'gran bstan bcos 'di //
translated: compares with Ratnasaṃbhava,

original: sngon gyi pandi ta dang lo ts'a bas //
analyzed: sngon gyi pandi ta dang lo ts'a bas //
translated: following the earlier pandits and translators

original: gangs can skad du bsgyur ba'i rjes su yang //
analyzed: gangs can skad du bsgyur ba'i rjes su yang //
translated: who translated it into the language of the snowy land.

original: ma dag dka' ba rnams //
analyzed: ma dag dka' ba rnams //
translated: The unclear and difficult parts

original: gtsug lag dbang po bgyis te ci nus bcos //
analyzed: gtsug lag dbang po bgyis te ci nus bcos //
translated: were corrected as best as possible by the one with the power of knowledge.

original: slad nnas 'jig rten mig mchog rnams kyis kyang //
analyzed: slad nnas 'jig rten mig mchog rnams kyis kyang //
translated: Later, even by the best eyes of the world,

original: 'grel dang bstun nas byi dor rnam dag zhu //
analyzed: 'grel dang bstun nas byi dor rnam dag zhu //
translated: and, in accordance with the commentary, perform a thorough cleaning.

original: sarba mangga lam// @243b  @244a
analyzed: sarba mangga lam// @243b  @244a
translated: sarva maṅgalam
